name: GENIUS Ultimate Anti-Aging Cream
about: What it is:  An airy, cloud-like vegan moisturizer that combats the look of lines and wrinkles to visibly firm, smooth, brighten, hydrate, and nurture skin...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dryness..Formulation: Lightweight Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.-Patented Alguronic Acid: Naturally sourced and sustainably produced from algae, itu2019s clinically shown to visibly minimize appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, as well as boost the benefits of other active ingredients..-Microalgae Oil: Hydrates, nurtures, and visibly restores skin's radiance, supporting skin cells for a softer look..-Exclusive Biomimetic Collagen: Helps to strengthen and condition the skin to visibly improve texture and suppleness...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan...What Else You Need to Know: This dermatologist-tested, non-comedogenic, and ultra-nurturing daily moisturizer infuses skin with a blend of actives including patented alguronic acid, exclusive biomimetic collagen, and microalgae oil to visibly brighten, hydrate, firm, lift, improve elasticity, and smooth fine lines and wrinkles resulting in a youthful glow...Clinical Results: In a self-assessment study with twice-daily use on 100 women:.- 95% experienced a brightening appearance to previously dull skin in 10 days.- 91% reported fragile skin appeared dramatically reinforced in 10 days.- 95% said skin appeared more firm and resilient with a renewed bounce and suppleness over 4 weeks
ingredients: -Patented Alguronic Acid: Naturally sourced and sustainably produced from algae, itu2019s clinically shown to visibly minimize appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, as well as boost the benefits of other active ingredients..-Microalgae Oil: Hydrates, nurtures, and visibly restores skin's radiance, supporting skin cells for a softer look..-Exclusive Biomimetic Collagen: Helps to strengthen and condition the skin to visibly improve texture and suppleness....Water (Aqua, Eau), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Glycerin, Chlorella Protothecoides Oil, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Pentylene Glycol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Parachlorella Beijerinckii Exopolysaccharides, Hydrolyzed Collagen*, Ceramide NP, Cynara Scolymus (Artichoke) Leaf Extract, Retinyl Palmitate, Astragalus Membranaceus Root Extract, Atractylodes Macrocephala Root Extract, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract, Copper Lysinate/Prolinate, Methylglucoside Phosphate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Silica, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Propylene Carbonate, Quartz, Phenoxyethanol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Chlorphenesin, Fragrance (Parfum), Coumarin....* Hydrolyzed Collagen is created by binding vegetable fibers together to create vegan, plant-based amino acids resulting in biomimetic collagen that is nearly identical in structure and function to animal-derived collagen.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing, apply to the entire face, neck, and chest, avoiding the eye area..-For optimal results, use after the Algenist skin care serum that best meets your unique skin needs (sold separately)... Precautions:.-Avoid contact with eyes..-Use only as directed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a big fan of Algenist concealer and their  prebiotic balancing mask. So I was excited to try their anti aging cream. And this one has been a perfect in between. It's hydrating but doesn't turn my tzone in to a grease pit. First off the texture is neat. It's like a fluffy jelly almost. I thought it was gonna be super thick but it's surprisingly light. A little goes a long way. So the travel size should last a while. My daughter says it's smells like honey buns every time I use it. Which it kinda does. It's a light pleasant smell. Right away after using it my skin looks plump and bright. With in an hour my skin feels so incredible soft and after two weeks of using it my skin texture is so much better. My skin is so much softer, more plump and much more radiant.

reviews.review_text: With the winter months upon us, moisturization is key! I have always been a fan of Algenist anti-aging skincare, being that I am in my late 30s. This cream is nice and rich, but is also really lightweight. The he fragrance is very light, so even people sensitive to fragrance would probably love it! u2728  I am absolutely loving this anti-aging cream! It applies so beautifully, absorbing instantly into my skin and leaving my skin feeling silky smooth! It doesnu2019t leave my skin lookin shiny like a lot of moisturizers do. I usually donu2019t use travel size products, so I definitely would prefer the full size. I am a huge fan of Algenist and how well it performs in my skin, Iu2019ve been using their anti-aging skincare for over a year now and always see instant and long term benefits. u2728

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried most every high end anti-aging cream on the market:  SK II, La Mer, La Prarie, MD Perricone(Cold Plasma is my second favorite; however, it is not sold at Sephora), and for me, this blows them out of the water.  I am fortunate in that I do not have very dry skin.  I only get a tad dry in the winter.  I do not find this cream to be particularly heavy at all.  A little goes a long way.  I just warm about 2 pea sized amounts in my palms and then press this moisturizer into my skin.  Pressing the moisturizer versus rubbing the moisturizer all over the skin makes all of the difference in the world.  This cream melts into the skin.  It is divine.  In the morning I wake up with super soft, plumped hydrated skin with noticeably diminished wrinkles.  My skin gets better with each and every use.  I noticed a review wherein it was mentioned that this moisturizer pills upon application.  That is not the fault of the moisturizer, it just means that you have applied this moisturizer over another product that is not complimentary, you are not giving the skin enough time to absorb the other products prior to application of moisturizer, layering silicone upon silicone, or you may need to manually exfoliate prior to application( I am a professional makeup artist so I know all about piling).  If you are not excessively dry, and are looking for a reasonably priced cream that will transform your skin overnight, give this one a go.  Not sure what I would do if Algenist ever stopped making this cream.

This product had good effects but took a while for it to work. (I am writing this for my mom). She noticed a difference after a couple weeks but if used for longer could have been an extravagant difference.

reviews.review_title: Thick Cream, Heavily Scented, Odd Texture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had great success with the Algenist before (specifically their eye cream), but I didn't love this anti-aging cream. The biggest reason this cream didn't work for me is because I have extremely oily skin, therefore this cream sat quite heavy on my skin and immediately broke me out. I might add that I'm in my early 20s so this cream may work better for someone with mature skin. I also found the texture of this cream especially odd (very strange consistency). If your skin is sensitive, avoid this cream since it's heavily scented and may irritate it. Overall, I would not recommend this cream to someone else. Maybe someone with dry skin would like this cream better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice creamy moisturizer. Wonderful smell. I donu2019t get breakouts from it. It leaves my skin feeling soft all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I see a visible difference, I've been using this consistently for 2 weeks. It does not make my face oily like Biossance does, the fragrance on this is minimal and it feels light on the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the try out kit, I think itu2019s a fine moisturizer. It had a thick consistency and soaks in well. A little goes a long way! Iu2019ve been using this for months and am just now running out. I donu2019t feel like I noticed any miraculous benefits from using this, so for that I believe itu2019s overpriced. Also not cruelty free.

reviews.review_title: Iu2019m not greasy after a long day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ever problem Iu2019ve had with every moisturizer is my skin feels great after application but my face is oily and feels greasy after a few hours.  My normal moisturizer which has been back ordered and I needed to find a new moisturizer. I saw this and thought Iu2019d give this a try, Iu2019m so happy that I did. This is the first moisturizer that my skin didnu2019t overreact to. My skin wasnu2019t oily as it would normally be. Even at the end of the night. I usually have to blot several times a day. I didnu2019t have to blot at all. So if you have oily skin this should work for you. It is expensive but you only need a little and I think this jar will last which in my opinion makes up for the price.  Iu2019m Chinese and have the skin tone that can tan. I have combination to oily skin (T zone).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer almost feels whipped- it's pillowy. It really absorbs well and is great for dry skin!  It's one of my go-to moisturizers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is incredible. The nicest night cream Iu2019ve ever used, and Iu2019ve used some over $300 a jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s extremely heavy perfect for the winter if youu2019re out walking a lot, however I see no magical changes to my skin when wearing it so the price canu2019t even begin to justify buying this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried dozens of different moisturizers over the years and this so far is my favorite. I use this and the eye moisturizer which is also really great after using Youth to the People Superberry Glow Oil and notice a definite improvement in skin tone and glow. I do think it helps with wrinkles also and firming up the neck some. Generally I do notice it helps  with aging. One thing though is it smells like vanilla frosting and I wish they used a rose scent instead or maybe something more citrusy. The smell is more mild than in the cleanser for this line which is horrible!!!

reviews.review_title: Really Great, Does What it Says
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really impressed with this moisturizer! For the cons: It does have a cottage cheese consistency, which is why i gave it 4 stars. I found that the consistency made it hard to get a good amount out of the jar and on my face without being wasteful. This was really annoying with the eye cream version, where i normally wouldn't need to use as much. I also didn't think this cream did that great of a job moisturizing dry spots. I still woke up with a bit of dry skin. Pros: it does really do what it says as far as firming and smoothing the skin. At 35, i really was looking for something to help with firming and texture and this really did a nice job at that. I've been using it for 4 days, morning and night and already started noticing the difference. My skin looks tighter and smoother and my makeup looks much nicer too. I am very impressed, but will likely need to add an oil to my routine to help with dryness. Word of caution: if you have sensitive skin/allergies, this can cause a little bit of a reaction. I had mild redness and itchiness when i first used it but it quickly went away and it didn't bother me as much. I think the benefit outweighs the mild reaction i had and would recommend trying this cream (just do a skin test first if you're sensitive like me).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail moisturizer I have been using this religiously for about two years and always come back to it when I try something new. It sinks into the sink so well and keeps it so hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I cannnnnnot live without this cream. I always have an extra on deck because I love it so much. I have sensitive & dry skin. I love that itu2019s basically fragrance free and the cream gets deep inside my skin that I literally have flawless skin. I use this in the morning before my SPF and at night as my night cream. My fine lines, dryness, and dull skin have improved.. plus I get compliments on my skin all the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just had my 35th birthday and wanting to advance my skin care routine and products. I came across this cream when I purchased the collagen package (A Must Have! )  Iu2019m in my third bottle of this Algenist Anti-aging cream, and I love it. I purchased the collagen package, which comes with a full size of the cream.   I love the texture and how moisturized it is. I use it twice a day (a little less during the day time) during the winter season, and night time only during the summer. I also use the Keihls midnight oil as my final step to lock in the moisture.   Definitely recommend the product!   PS: I stocked up like 3 jars during the Sephora sale! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m 25 and I never thought that I would need to use an anti-aging cream. Iu2019ve had pretty decent skin (combination) and used a variety of products over time like the Tatcha Water Cream or Tidal by Sunday Riley. But I really wanted to create a healthy skin regimen.   I was in the market for a new moisturizer when Algenist brand rep Astrid (my new favorite human being) suggested Algenist. She was super honest about it and told me she used it herself. Her skin, flawless, I might add. Also, as a person of color, not all products are geared towards our skin so it was important for me to know Iu2019m using a product that can handle its unique properties. Iu2019ve been using it for about two weeks now and my skin has never looked better! Itu2019s brighter, moisture balanced and a lot tighter and firmer than before. I even had a scar on my face from using a curling iron and it has begun lightening and fading since using these products. I love that it doesnu2019t have an overpowering scent and is great for sensitive skin.   Donu2019t be put off by the price! We will spend so much in makeup to conceal errors, but the best investment is in your skin. And trust me, a little goes a long way! So I definitely recommend and I know you wonu2019t regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Algenist Genius for a few years, and been pleased with this product. I'm wondering if they've changed the formula a bit, as my most recent container has a different consistency than it usually does. Instead of being quite firm, the cream is more lotion consistency. I don't like this consistency as much.

reviews.review_title: Plumps and Fills in my Fine Lines
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have struggled to find a moisturizer that is hydrating but not oily.  I am not over the moon about this product, but have repurchased several times, because it is the best solution I have found so far.  I am sensitive to fragrance and my husband even more so, but we both like the scent which never happens with him!  I feel it helps with my fine lines particularly around my eye area.  It never has caused any irritation or clogging of my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how it hydrates my skin. Smooth. Iu2019m also someone who doesnu2019t take good care of my skin and after I started using this people have been complimenting me. But most importantly I like how my skin feels.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ran out of this moisturizer and decided to finish up all the samples and half-used bottles of other moisturizer over the summer.  Plus with heavy sunscreen use and the high humidity of Pennsylvania, I wasn't using a lot of moisturizer anyway.  During the VIB sale, I repurchased this Algenist Genius cream.  I put it on before bed after using the Algenist Liquid Collagen (which I love, too).  I'm not even kidding when I tell you that the next morning all those fine lines around my lips and eyes had become noticeable smaller.  My skin looked smoother and brighter after ONE application.  This stuff is awesome.  May I never run out again nor will I try anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm giving this a higher grade because this is a packaging fail, not a product fail. I was given a sample of this cream as an eye cream and I cannot implore you enough, do not put it near your eyes. Perhaps it works well as an anti-aging cream. It should not go anywhere near your eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product as a deluxe sample a while back and used it on its own almost every night thereafter. It moistures really well and makes my skin feel smooth and supple. The consistency is airy and bouncy, similar to ricotta cheese, which sounds bad but really isn't. A little goes a long way with this product. I love to use it around my eyes especially, though the directions advise against that. I put it on at night, and in the morning I notice that my face looks very healthy. I loved this product as a sample, but probably wouldn't buy it if given the chance. It's not a bad product by any means, but I have had others that smell and look better, though the results are relatively the same. In the end, I want my night time routine to feel luxurious after a long day's work, and while this product works well, it doesn't have any of the glamour of other products like those in the Clinique range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Une creme vraiment efficace pour les peaux matures .  Belle qualite de produit avec cette compagnie Algenist j'adore

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cream firms and brightens for sure. Not enough moisturizing though. Wrinkles look the same.  It's been three weeks since I have started using it. I would recommend it if you don't expect it to fight your wrinkles in a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream. I can tell such a difference in my skin when I switch to another cream, so I always come back to this one. My lines are reduced, skin is bright and radiant, redness is gone. It's the best!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this cream, in conjunction with its sister oil, for about ten years now. I love them both. This cream is different - it has a slightly cottage cheese consistency, but no actual curds. It is always cool to the touch, but melts upon contact with skin. It is so very hydrating. The scent is fresh, slight, airy. I supposedly look quite a bit younger than my age. I credit this to lucky genes, good skin care over a lifetime, and Algenist.

reviews.review_title: Best anti against cream Iu2019ve tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally the best night cream Iu2019ve tried and Iu2019ve tried all of them that Sephora has to offer. The texture is creamy but light, absorbs fairly quickly. Totally light enough to wear under makeup during the day. This has improved the look of my skin dramatically. My contours appear more defined, my fragile skin seems more elastic and strong, and my fine lines are greatly diminished. Would recommend this to my best friend. Love this brand, love the product. Love it

reviews.review_title: Liquid collagen & Pressed serum is better!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the pressed power serum better. This did nothing. Even the liquid collagen gave me better results. I will not be buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is now my go to anti-aging product. Its a bit expensive but I promise it lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only anti aging product I need.  It isn't too heavy like some of the other stuff out there, and doesn't clog my pores in my super active oily skin. It decreases my fine lines, tightens my pores, and when I use it regularly only at night I get so many compliments.  I ran out about a month ago and decided to try another product that touts being all natural.  I'm right back on the Algenist Genius train, I could tell my skin didn't look as good and I stopped getting comments on it.  Even my husband noticed the difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried for 3 months. Wasn't totally wowed by it. The texture is nice and absorbs well. The scent is pleasant. Didn't see any noticeable changes. Overall it's a nice moisturizer and looks good under makeup- but I can think of a few other moisturizers that performed waaaay better at this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a few months now and it's amazing. I noticed some wrinkles around my eyes whenever I squint and they're practically gone now. This makes me skin feel super soft and I love how it smells.

reviews.review_title: Best of the best for my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am 47, have large pores but normal skin that leans towards dry. I do experience periodic light acne and live in a hot summer climate which exposes my skin to intense sun and sweat. I am super particular about my face products, especially moisturizer, and this one has been my go-to for years now. Lightweight, blends in beautifully, smells like delicate vanilla. Doesnu2019t make my face feel shiny or greasy, and does make it feel supple and moisturized. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for moisturizing, but do not use if you have rosacea.  My skin was very red.  This also has fragrance in it, which I believe irritated my skin more.  Returning back to Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing, firming, and great for sensitive skin. I use this at least 2-3 times a week on my breasts and bum to keep them looking perky and smooth. Greatly advise this product of you are losing a tonne of weight and the skin starts to loosen and sag before it tones. The container is very large considering the is only two ounces, but a little goes a long way, and it is aesthetically appealing. I should start using it on my forehead lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried many moisturizers from drug store to brands I ordered directly from Korea to the Uber expensive. Iu2019ve never been impressed with any results until I tried this. My skin looks amazing. I get compliments all the time and people think I look at least 10 years younger than I am. This cream is definitely a keeper. Iu2019ve use it exclusively for 2 years now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about two weeks now. i have notice the redness and flakiness I get from using Tazorac diminish using this moisturizer. I have found that I sometimes need to add a second helping as my skin can still feel dry. This could be due to all the acne meds I'm still on. It feels comfortable on my very sensitive skin and I'm looking foward to seeing how a whole month will treat me. Thank you Algenist!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for two months and Iu2019m in love. I have adult acne. So I had dullness, discoloration, dark spots and scaring. My skin is so much brighter, working off the dark spots and I now have even skin tone. Overall my skin looks so much healthier with a wonderful glow. Iu2019m now starting to be able to just moisture and go in the mornings which is something I never ever could do before. I used Murad for years but this is next level.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is good, not great. Overall not super impressed, lacks moisture for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works well, I love the texture, and it has a light subtle scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Amazing fragrance. Goes on smooth and nongreasy. Leaves my skin skin feeling fresh and I am not oily later in the day. Has been helping with wrinkles and red spots. This is my second time purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has changed my skin for the better. I dropped one star because it doesnu2019t keep my skin as hydrated in the bitter cold winter months, but overall I think itu2019s worth it if you want radiant skin.  A little goes a long way, and although it is pricy it does last quite a long time. Would recommend for those struggling to find a light weight moisturizer for anti aging purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. Iu2019ve noticed a definite smoothing of fine lines on the face. And contrary to some of the reviews I read, I donu2019t find the smell off putting in any way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had an invisible texture on my cheeks (entire area from the apples to the jawline) since I was a child that gets worse in the winter, further aggravated by the fact that I do winter sports. Since I'm in my 40s, my skin has become drier and it's even worse. I've tried so many combinations of things in hopes of smoothing that skin out and nothing really worked. Since I found this product, all I have to do it use a basic gentle cleanser with my Clairisonic and then put a small amount of this on and my skin, even at the roughest spots, stays baby soft all day. I do not notice it helping any of the small wrinkles around my eyes but it does absolutely plump my entire face and gives it that springy feel it used to have in my youth. It also does not break me out, which is a huge problem for my sensitive skin. The softness I get with this product is what I've always been looking for and I'm so happy I finally found it. A little goes a long way...I have best results when used sparingly all over and then another tiny dab on my trouble spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Funny story.  We're moving so I was sorting through my bathroom drawers and found a sample of this AMAZING cream.  I started using it not expecting anything different from my many other moisturizers.  The first thing I noticed was how plump my skin felt after a few days use.  My husband even noticed when he kissed my cheek.  Then I started to get complements on my complexion....and that hasn't happened since...well that hasn't happened.  I'm so purchasing this product!  I have dry skin and I'm in my 40's but wish I had started using this years ago!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! I tried liquid collagen from the brand before and that's how my love for Algenist started. This cream has a very different texture, it's not soft, it's almost like a balm. It's absolutely luxurious, rich and nourishing. It melts into your skin and feels very moisturizing. It is pricey but I feel like because of its texture it will last longer than other creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail of moisturizers -- it keeps my skin so soft and amazing without being greasy and overpowering. The only time it doesn't work for me is in very cold temperatures, when my skin is so dry that it just craves something super heavy. Every other day of the year this is my go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am 32, and I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this product and the entire GENIUS line! I loved that it hydrates my skin, and keeps it looking young and fresh! I went a week without it, because I was waiting for it to come in the mail. When it came, I immediately started using it again. My husband asked me if my Algenist came. I said, u201cYes, why?u201d He responded with, u201cI can tell. Keep using that stuff.u201d I agree with him! I totally think itu2019s worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is AMAZING! The second after I put it on, I am glowing! It keeps my skin moist and dewey all day long! I only have some fine lines around the eyes and one in my forehead so canu2019t speak to it improving wrinkles, but since using this with my roc retinol nightly, my fine lines have really improved! I am often complemented on my skin which I will say is due to genetics as well but I tell everyone about this genius cream!! 100% would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite moisturizer! In the span of a few short days, it completely got rid of all the dry patches on my face (like the sides of my nose, my forehead and around my lips). I have honestly never had my skin this soft before using this cream. The price is a little steep but a little goes along way, I managed to get around 5mos out of this little jar, applying in the AM and PM so it is worth it. I will keep buying this as long as I can afford it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I use it at night, my skin feels moisturized and is glowing in the morning.  I find it hard to find the right balance of moisture; this does not make your skin greasy.

reviews.review_title: Moussy Deep Moisture without Oily Face!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as a night cream - smells lightly like coconut, and goes on like a regular moisturizer despite its spongy texture.  I've tried other anti-aging moisturizers, only to have a very oily face the next day.  A little goes a long way with this.  I use it in combination with Drunk Elephant cleanser, Vinopure serum - and voila!  Clean, bright, happy, moisturized skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many expensive face creams from well known luxury brands and they don't compare to this. I discovered this brand earlier this year at a Sephora Algenist event. The rep there was even stunned at how much I spent on serums, creams, etc. She showed me what a great cream this was and it worked for her. I have been using it ever since and am beyond amazed at the difference it has made. My skin loves this cream and I use it both AM and PM after the algenist serum. My face glows and its smoother than ever. I may have good life Gene's but I look 10 years younger. No one believes my age because I devotedly use my face products. I'm so glad I discovered this cream and my mom was converted as well and she loves it. During the summer time, I just used this at night time. At night, i use this with a sleep mask over it and my skin just glows!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Algenist complete eye renewal balm so when I needed to replenish my face moisturizer I tried this one. Itu2019s terrible. The texture reminds me of slime and it smells like lake sludge. The eye balm is excellent, but this one had to go back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using it for months and I've seen literally no changes to my skin or a reduction in wrinkles

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but sadly I donu2019t! It just sat on top of my skin and pilled   :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this and can tell a difference when I use it   I am on my 3rd one so I guess I like it LOT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. Before I purchased it, my skin was very dry and rough. I can see a big difference already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved everything about the u2018oldu2019 Algenist regenerative night cream. Iu2019d have given that one five stars, and actually did in that review. One thing kept me from really loving it: the scent. All my other GENIUS products smell good or have no scent. Can any recent buyers of this new GENIUS night cream smells?  I absolutely know the quality will be perfect! Thanks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this cream for about 2 weeks in combination with the serum and I love it. I am 41 with normal/dry skin. Some early signs of aging, fine lines. Since I have started using this my skin feels smoother and looks more plump and even.  I like the texture and am very happy with this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a Rouge member for almost 10yrs now I believe (back when you had to spend $1,000 in a month to get the status), I've used every high end brand (most are excellent) however this by far is my favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream, it is super hydrating and creamy but not heavy. It quickly absorbs and leaves my skin feeling supple plus I see an improvement in my skins texture and appearance. I donu2019t know what it is but it make me feel confident in the mornings where I can run errands make up free. Also I love the smell, tropical and fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so, Iu2019m 21 so obviously I still have a young face and shouldnu2019t be worrying but due to my history with an eating disorder and losing weight rapidly, I do have fine lines in some areas also I have bags under my eyes. Using this product has helped significantly also, it is good to use products to help put off the aging process for the future. I would recommend this product for tightening and reducing signs of aging on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: #1 favorite moisturizer Iu2019ve ever used. Yes, itu2019s pricey, but it just feels so good on the skin. It was recommended by a friend who swore it took 10 years off her face. I didnu2019t need an adjustment period trying out this new product; my skin instantly liked it. It also smells really nice. Would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hated the scent.  For the price tag, there are better creams out there than this one.  Didn't like the thick paste-like texture or consistency as it was hard to scoop out of the jar and spread on my face.

reviews.review_title: Great moisturizer, but not Cruelty Free
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heard great things about Algenist and was really curious to try this. It was really nice. It made me feel like I was doing something great for my face and my face did feel pretty good after a few days. I might have tried to keep it going, but after seeing way too many documentaries on animal cruelty etc. over the last year, I ultimately decided that I no longer wanted to purchase products that fall under that umbrella. Algenist doesn't test on animals, but they do sell in China where testing is required which still doesn't work for me. Great brand overall and I like some of their other products, but won't be using anymore until they work that out.   Overall, I really like this cream. If you're ok w the whole Animal Testing thing (Ignorance is Bliss?), sure.. go for it. Personally, I've already found another moisturizer that I really like that is everything friendly (:

reviews.review_title: First Time Iu2019ve Used The Whole Jar- LOVE IT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea-prone skin, thatu2019s combination and beginning to show first signs of aging (46) - Iu2019ve tried everything from LaMer to Tatcha to Dior and back, including other Algenist products. This is the FIRST time Iu2019ve ever used the whole jar of a moisturizer because they usually end up irritating my skin or causing blackheads around my nose. This moisturizer does not feel heavy and does not clog pores, but it does deliver clean, supple hydration. It also makes skin supple, younger-looking and just pretty. Iu2019m happily on my second 2 oz jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in my mid thirties and have pimples and wrinkles. Yay! I really like this stuff. A little goes a long way. It feels silky and makes my skin hydrated and plump. Some reviews say they mind the smell; I think itu2019s fine. Itu2019s 2 oz instead of the usual 1.7 which makes me feel a little better about the steep price. The jar lasts me a long time, so the price is worth it to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GENIUS indeed! This works so well for my skin both day and night. It has become my go to moisturizer. I recommend for normal to dry skin, but will add that it does not increase oiliness on my nose, which can still be a problem for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best Iu2019ve ever found. First time was in a trial package and loved so much had to buy even though pricey. A little goes a long way. Brightens my skin without any irritation on my super sensitive skin. I hope this is never discontinued.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's like putting water on the skin. Does not do absolutely anything. I also made the mistake of putting  it on top of Tata Harper repairative moisturizer, and it was a terrible combo. It does not have any scent, I didn't see anything speecial about this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. Like the reviewer before, I was a La Mer soft creme user for years. I was really beginning to struggle with the grease factor though, and the lotions just werenu2019t cutting it for a night creme. This one has a lovely marshmallow-y scent and the jar is so luxuriously heavy. The texture of the creme is very unique. Itu2019s somewhere between whipped and regular cream. It really melts/absorbs into the skin, leaving no grease or residue. I really miss this product on the nights when I use an oil instead and have noticed it really does a great job at keeping my skin beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed the lightweight gel cream texture it absorbs well and my skin appears deeply hydrated and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the price. It hydrates but if you have oily skin it makes it a lot worse. But used on dry patches. But for the price tag I would look else where.

reviews.review_title: Just not worth my time or money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fan of the Algenist brand, it pangs to me say that this was by far, the worst cream moisturizer I have ever tried - and I have used A LOT of creams in my lifetime.   Dubious anti-aging claims aside, the pungent artificial plastic-y scent was a huge put off. But whatever, if it can help me retain what I have left of my youthful looks I can power through it. But then came the weird non Newtonian fluid consistency. Like, how... and why. Literally dip my finger deep into the jar and pick up next to no product. You really gotta dig up little chunks and work it into your face. Even after that the efficacy was a lackluster meh.  It was difficult to work with and took me about 3 uses later to decide moisturizing shouldn't be this hard.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say much about this moisturizer because though I tried several times to use it and ended up washing it off each tome because the scent made my nose itch and made me sneeze.

reviews.review_title: Nice cream, moisturizing and minimizes lines.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this with an order and immediately purchased after one use.  I'm about half-way through my jar.  I still love to use it - don't see dramatic differences from using it for a long period of use though.  I've used it mostly during the winter.  My skin can be dry and this helped with dryness and ultimately lines caused by my skin being dry.  It sinks in well to my skin.  BUT if I use it on my neck, each and every time, I get a rash.  Goes away immediately once I wash my face and neck and do not put this on my neck.  I do recommend this product, it is smooth, moisturizing and helps with lines.  Not sure I'd repurchase just because I do like to try other skincare products because there is always something new out there.  No smell, creamy, a little goes a long way, works.  Give it a try if you want to splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny.  This is the only brand to show true noticeable results. Makes my skin smooth and supple while fading fine lines in a short period of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does lock in moisture but for the price, I should not only have a moisturizer but something that also makes my skin look amazing. The price for this moisturizer is the price of a serum and a standard moisturizer which would give you better results. Iu2019m not floored by it, which is disappointing considering it is over $100

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this from Sephora in a previous order & being that itu2019s pretty pricey I was quite excited. It is moisturizing and non-greasy but the smell was very off putting. I donu2019t think Iu2019d be able to purchase a full-size container, due to the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this, it's good, but not my favorite.  When I'm unsure what face to cream to use this is my fall back.  I have dry sensitive skin and after a week I don't see great results but it keeps me moisturized until I can get my favorite face cream. It's not bad, but not fabulous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Use every other night and I wake up feeling so refreshed and glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used with the pressed serum as part of a value set.  Not hydrating enough for my dry/combo winter skin, and the fragrance was really irritating. My face felt tight, and I could smell the products an hour after application. I had to wash off. Returning tomorrow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it.  Have never thought I'd join the ranks of those spending close to $100 for skincare but this stuff has made me do it!  First experienced this cream as part of the Algenist  Anti-aging kit and now I'm hooked.  Repurchasing this and the Power pressed night serum.  Brighter, more even, toned, and moisturized skin. Feels wonderful putting on, like moisturizing marshmallow cream!  Most surprising of all, I honestly believe the Genius/Power combo actually shrank the large pores on my nose and chin versus making them worse, which was my fear with heavy moisture - seemed to have a refining effect on my face as a whole. My skin is brighter, smoother, and just better looking--my husband noticed and I've seen the changes myself.  I've actually had to use less foundation to avoid my face looking too smooth/made up because it looks better on its own now, a first for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was one of the samples I received with one of my first Sephora orders and it became an instant favorite. The silky feel, the way my skin absorbs the product, that perfect softness, with that vanilla creme smell is just so many slices of happy that when I ran out, I ran to the store and got the full size. If you're worried about the price, don't -- a little goes a long way. It's a great investment in your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to order this cream. I found it to be very thick. I am not sure why??  Also, it separated after putting on my primer which felt like little pieces  flaking off. Never had that happen with other moisturizers. So I had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I find the texture of this cream really stiff and almost rubbery.  Any of the face creams that I've used in the past have been smooth and spreadable.  So, it's kind of weird.  Also, the scent is quite coconut-ty, which some might like, but I'm not a huge fan.

reviews.review_title: Best used overnight in dry weather
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a thicker moisturizing cream, so works best for night and winter/dry seasons (or for perennially dry skin). I uased it alone, with no other serums. People seem to be divided over the scent, but I really like it: to me, it smells like horchata. I'm taking one star off because this doesn't absorb super well--in the morning when I wash my face, it feels like there is still a little bit of residue from the cream there. It does make my skin feel softer and more hydrated, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has an intense vanilla smell and a bouncy texture if you press on it while it's in the jar. The texture is hard to explain, but it's not creamy. If you warm it up between your fingers, it does melt and doesn't feel oily or greasy. My skin felt soft, but had a slight tack and unfortunately pilled badly on me. That did not change whether or not I used more, less, double cleansed, used toner or not, changed the application method, or exfoliated beforehand. I've used a whole .23 oz jar and have had no improvement in fine lines, brightness, or hyper-pigmentation. I had pics for my own comparison. My skin is combination/oily. I'm glad it worked well for so many people. It just did not do it for me. I intended to dive into the brand head first, but I can't get past the pilling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this stuff is like a sickeningly sweet vanilla. It's really weird and I normally like vanilla, so it's like you kind of hate it, but it is tolerable. If it wasn't for the smell I'd give it 5 stars.   I got a sample of this and while I'm in my mid-20s, I noticed it did brighten my skin and my smile lines seemed to have lessened the morning after. It's a good product, but I wouldn't buy it until I'm in my 30s/mid-30s perhaps; if they're still around then. If they are, I'd buy it. Maybe. Again the smell is kind of a deterrent, but if it works then of course I'd want to try it once more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is pretty amazing. My frown lines diminished, my face is more clear and bright. I sometimes get redness around my cheeks and uneven skin tone but this somehow helped that in addition to the frown lines. I do feel like i have to use a good amount of product to get a full spread all over my face and neck. I've been using for a month so far twice a day but will prob progress to just night time use to stretch out this expensive product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the Genius line. Makes my skin feel like satin sheets. Have not seen a difference in fine lines/wrinkles, however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No noticeable anti-aging results and not a particularly good moisturizer for dry skin. Overpriced and underdelivery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small sample of this in a Sephora Play Box. I have been using it everyday for a week and Iu2019ve already noticed how smooth and more clear my skin is, even when I slept in my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this product a 1 for various different reasons. The product is thick like a body cream and personally I don't like any heavy creams on my face. The smell is brutal. It has a chemical smell to it.( That is mostly why I gave it a low star) I personally prefer a soft scent. It did moisturize.. but it felt heavy on my face. Almost felt like a heavy coverup. Overall the dry time was quick...it did leave a tingly sensation on my face as well which i didn't like.  The kind of skin I have is olive skin with a combination of oily and dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Simply the best. I've used this for a couple of years and everyone thinks I'm 10 years younger. It erased fine my lines, made my skin brighter and more even toned. It's just amazing!!! You need a pea size to cover your entire face because the consistency is such that it spreads and absorbs easily.

reviews.review_title: Boring at best, acne-causing at worst
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product performed worse than cheap drugstore day and night creams I've used. It smelled odd, clumped disturbingly, and if anything my skin was slightly worse after using it. Don't waste your money on tinctures of proprietary ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like to use this as an under eye cream because I think it works miracles on my dark circles and really plumps the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received play sample and pleasantly surprised.  Because only sample size, can't say I've seen dramatic anti-aging impact, but after turning 30 I'm looking at option for different anti-aging creams.  This one has a really nice and but light scent, sort of vanilla-like and it's got a medium thickness to it but absorbs well.  It also sits very well underneath makeup (I do use a face oil before applying so that may be factor) and i will likely be purchasing full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this product and it works!The best part is that you see the results quickly and itu2019s continues to improve my skin daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received as a free sample and it left me wishing I had a full bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream. I've used a lot of face creams and this is the best so far. I love that it is super moisturizing but soaks up quickly and is not oily. I recently had a cold and this made my skin not dry out completely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cream. The texture is like a rich whipped cream, which has a bit of bounce in it, almost jelly like. So far it has worked well for my sensitive skin and the scent is very light scent that reminds me of fresh whipped cream, almost unscented. Overall I'm happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cream in my Sephora play box. I have combination skin, so I was a bit hesitant to use it at first,because my skin is prone to breakouts. And it is very thick, so I was worried it may be too much for my sensitive skin. First let me say, that a little goes a very long way! So if you're wondering if its worth the price, the answer is yes! i think it will last awhile. It left my skin feeling hydrated, minus the heavy feeling. However, as the instructions say, its important to avoid the eye area! I was careless and accidentally swiped some across my eyelids, and now my eyelids feel sticky and tight. Of course that was my mistake, just be sure to avoid the eye area if you use this amazing cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im a sample junkie of moisturizer and will get months supplies before I buy I large jar of anything. I have super dry skin that will make even a small line look like the Grand Canyon. This stuff is beyond amazing. Iu2019ve tried everything. This soaks right in and plumps every line, keeps it moisturized all day. Itu2019s like a mouse gel that u donu2019t need much. It does roll up if you use a serum or donu2019t exfoliate regularly but wonu2019t moisturizer doesnu2019t. I stick with that routine at night. My skin feels and looks amazing. This is definitely worth every penny.

reviews.review_title: You will never want anything else after this..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received 30ml trial size in a sample kit for my birthday in July. The kit also contained a full size Power Anti Aging Serum, a small Genius eye cream and the Rejuvenating Facial Cleanser.  It's now November and I still have well over half the pot left!  I am in love with it and now firmly refuse anything else on my skin.  It's so silky and comfortable.  Absorbs easily, makes my skin very soft, smells divine and make up goes on a dream.  The 30ml will probably last at least 8 months, so the 60ml should last about a year.  That is under $10 a month.  You don't need much and it feels like absolute luxury. It does make a noticeable difference to my skin, with a reduction in lines and dryness and gives a general healthy suppleness.  I won't pretend that it will have any permanent effect, but it makes my skin look so much better for the day or night ahead. A good skin day!  Love, love, love Algenist and now I never want to try anything else! Just a tip, my local Winners/TJ Maxx sometimes have Algenist at a reduced price.  Just sometimes.  But honestly, when you buy the Genius Cream, you are buying a year's supply.  So don't be scared of the price. P.S  I am so addicted I bought the Genius Foundation...absolute holy grail, but that's in another review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample in my play box and was obsessed immediately! the formula is on the thicker side but sets into ur skin leaving it feeling super soft and hydrating. the small sample lasted me so long since I only needed to use a small amount. the only thing I don't like is the syper high price tag. this is something I would splurge on during a sale

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was just getting to the point where I was noticing wrinkles coming in on my forehead and around my eyes. I grabbed this as the 100 point sample to try different things to combat my new wrinkles. Iu2019m 28 so itu2019s not doing heavy lifting just preventative work. Iu2019m very happy with the results. The small amount of wrinkles I was starting to see are practically gone. My skin is bright and smooth and not greasy in the morning. I will be buying the big version and keeping this as part of my preemptive routine.

I got this with my 100 points reward and used it night and day for a month. I really thought this cream wouldn't be anything special, but omg it's probably the best moistuzrier I've ever used!   I have normal skin just FYI.   So first of all, it smells amazing. Like sweet frosting. The texture is so fun and unique, like whipped mousse! And a little goes a VERY LONG WAY! Which is good.   The reason I give this five stars is because after using it, I've never felt my skin so soft before. It wasn't left sticky or greasy like most creams leave my skin. My face was so glowy, moisturized, and bright! I noticed my skin becoming more smooth.   It is super expensive, but I definitely see myself purchasing the full size in the future. And I def would recommend this to anyone who has very dry skin. It's a perfect rich heavy winter moisturzier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my Play! box and it was awesome. I legitimately feel like I noticed a difference when using it, and I scraped every last bit out of the jar when it was running out. It's just so expensive. :'-(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I also received this in my play box. Used it once at night and 2nd time after morning shower. The 2nd night I glanced in the mirror thinking my skin looked smooth, plump, and glowing.  This was the only new product I had applied. Also, it did not irritate my rosacea.  I'm a frugal girl, but this will be a product I buy.

It's super hydrating, may be best used as a night cream depending on user's skin type. A little goes a long way. But that's not why I'm leaving a review.   This product smells like heaven. Sugary, sweet, decadent. I got this in my Play box last month and fell in love. I LOVE buttercream frosting, and that's exactly what it smells like.   I'm debating eventually spending the $117 on the full size just for its smell. That's how good it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've had very bad eyesight since I was born (to the extent that it cannot be corrected to over 20/60 even with lenses). Due to the eye strain from my poor vision, I've been noticing some very fine lines forming on my forehead the past couple of years (I'll be 30 in December). I don't have lines anywhere else, so I assume it's more so the eye strain than aging, which led me to believe that it would be more difficult to treat.   I've tried numerous products and this has been the only one I've found that has helped to diminish the fine lines. I plan on repurchasing this again once it runs out, rather than experiment with a new product like I'm usually inclined to do. I'm not crazy about the texture, but I've gotten used to it. In my case, I achieved results by applying a very thin layer once a day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I got the sample in the Play box and I felt and saw a difference in my skin right away. Itu2019s pricey but you donu2019t need a lot. And it smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely amazing! I have only been using it for 2 days, but my skin feels so soft. I am totally in love with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my play box and was happy to try something from this brand. I like everything about this product other than the smell. So first, I hate to find fragrance in skin care ingredients. This smells like my grandmother, and I could get over the sent but it stays with me for hours. This is an absolute no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works fine but the smell is awful, it smells like I am at a fair and rubbing fried dough (elephant ear, donut, churro etc...) on my face, not refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice..I like that it goes on easily and absorbs quickly. Although, I'm not crazy about the smell, it won't stop me from using it because it's great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizing cream. It has a nice, thick, creamy texture, which is what I like. It smells great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was a nice skin cream. It definitely smelled nice and sweet, it went on smoothly, was moisturizing, however I can't vouch that it really did anything for my skin. It did not cause any breakouts. Based on the 2 week sample jar I used I would not drop this type of money on a jar of this.

I got this anti-aging cream in my play box I've been using it at night right before I go to bed and if I'm running late and I don't have the opportunity to wash my face and put moisturizer on for the day it doesn't matter this anti-aging cream it keeps my face soft ALL day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PLAY! box win!  first let me say I love the scent! it melts into your skin.  I have been only using it for about a week now. so I can't speak on anti ageing..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for a couple of years and I'm really happy with it.  I actually saw how much of a difference it makes because I ran out and didn't have time to get some more.  I could actually see my skin lose firmness and that made me hurry to get another jar!  It's expensive, yes, but it lasts and it really makes a difference.
Love it. Not oily or greasy. I put it on at night after cleaning my face and it doesn't take much at all. The moisture lasts for days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using Algenist products about 6 months ago. I love this  wonderful anti-aging cream. It is a nice consistency and just a little on the face morning and  night is all you need. I am very pleased with the results. My skin appears firmer and my lines are less noticeable. This is an advanced anti aging cream which, for the first time, fuses alguronic acid and the new breakthrough microalgae oil. I use this along with the new Algenist Genius Liquid Collagen. The combination of these two products has definitely improved my skin. The collagen liquid is new. However, I can certainly see a difference since adding this to my regime.
Smells so nice !!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for moisture!  Noticed an improvement in fine lines after completing one jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product - works well moisturizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is definitely moisturizing, but it has an odd spongey texture and a mildly offensive baby-powder scent. Not a fan.

I love this cream. It smells lovely, kind of like coconut and reminds me of being on a beach vacation. I hate mornings so every bit of cheer helps. It does feel quite heavy, but it doesn't leave greasy residue, I find it absorbs into the skin quite nicely. Though I do have dry-normal skin with an oily chin and I barely apply this to my chin to avoid breakouts. So warning to ladies with oily skin, it may not be for you. All in all, I say purchase this if you are looking to battle early signs of aging. It's a great product, and while pricey, it find it works better than those similarly priced products I've tried. A little goes a long way with this too. Using every morning a 1oz jar lasts me about 2-3mo.   If you want more details- I'll share my experience below. I feel like it's hard to tell if a product is truly having a positive effect on your skin. We know right away if we're more oily or breaking out, but a bit more radiant, fine lines getting finer - that's harder to see, Esp when we look in the mirror every single day. After using this product for about a year I switched to a different high-end lotion with brightening enzymes. After about 3 months I could see the difference algenist had been making that I just didn't realize. Those 3 months without it, my skin lost radiance, fine lines became much more noticeable and the scarring from the random cystic zit I'll get every now and then on my chin doesn't fade as quickly. The biggest shock is the tone of my skin. It's not as even as it was, and that tacked on with how dull my skin is I no longer feel confident leaving the house without some tinted moisturizer and highlighter. For the first time in my life, I cannot attribute stress or diet to this as I've been very healthy and have taken time off from work. This is 100% because of the change in face cream. Algenist is most definitely my holy grail and I won't wander from it again. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny. Goes on gently like marshmallow cream. There is a soft fragrance that's nice. I will definitely reorder. I'm 71 yrs. old

I have used two jars of this anti-aging cream and always recommend it. It is super hydrating, great for all skin types and it smells like Cinnabon icing! What's not to love? A tiny bit goes a long way and it truly absorbs like butter into the skin. I was using it as a night cream and a jar lasted about a year for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Algenist products generally, but this moisturizer, while very expensive, was not a good product for me. I applied on top of a serum, as well as to product-less skin. It balls up in seconds turning the moisturizer to little gooey balls as if you spread Elmer's glue on your face. I got a sample and fell in love with the scent, with the mousse-like, custardy texture, but after splurging on $115 for the 2oz, I returned it. To be fair, I used it daily, sometimes in the morning, sometimes at night, or both with clean skin or on top of other products. It did not play well with other products or alone. I would never repurchase this, sadly.
I love everything about this cream. It smells amazing and really does what it's supposed to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been combatting hormonal cystic acne for 6+ months. It was awful, especially since I never really experienced acne in my teens. This cream + the REN calming cleanser quite literally saved my skin. First of all, this cream smells like vanilla icing. The texture is also one that I've never really had before - airy, bouncy, yet extremely moisturizing. When I put this on at night, I wake up with baby smooth skin. For the several drug store and cheaper products I tried, I should've just saved that $ from the start and bought this. Seriously, it's worth it.

reviews.review_title: Jelly, Sticky, but does the job
reviews.review_text: I'm a bit unsure how I feel about continuing to use this cream. It has a jelly feel to it, doesn't come out as easily as most creams do. The smell is amazing! Smells a bit sugary. It does leave my skin feeling a bit sticky though. I'm not sure if that's other people's experience or maybe something I'm pairing it with. It does leave my skin softer though! I usually have small acne bumps and I've noticed a decrease in the hardness of them! My fine lines appear to look the same. Might be a better winter cream?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but I feel it is necessary to declare my love for this product && the undereye balm. I recently received this Genius cream and undereye balm from a sample I picked with my points. I AM OBSESSED now and am going to have to save up to buy the larger size when it runs out. I LOVE the texture of this product and truly a little bit goes a long way so its worth the money because it will last! I love how its lightweight too. Prior to this sample I was using Olay regenerist which I liked a lot but once I tried the Algenist Genius cream + the smashbox pore minimizer primer its like a whole new world for my makeup routine! This combo has been a night and day difference with the way my makeup looks on my skin. Its INSANE! My skin looks FLAWLESS now. Sucks its so expensive but totally worth it!! I will never go to anything else. PS I would say my skin type is pretty normal but kind of dry around my chin area and my undereyes seem a little dry one I apply concealer but now after using their eye balm + the naked concealer, my undereyes look FLAWLESS all day! My T Zone can get a little oily but after this routine I have ZERO issues. LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!!!
This product has results! it is pricey but worth every penny! you don't need a lot just a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a good, moisturizing, anti-aging night cream, and I stumbled across this as a 100-point reward. It's not strictly a night cream, but I have oily skin and this was too heavy for me as a day cream, so I tried it at night. Without fail, if I put this on at night I wake up to better looking skin. I feel like my skin looks refreshed, my skin tone is more even, and my lines are less noticeable. And it smells so good. My 6-year old said it smells like frosting, I think it smells like horchata. I'm pretty frugal and shiver thinking about the price, but I definitely feel like it's worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and like it a lot. I was generous with use and really into the bouncy texture of it. It hydrated very well u2014 anyone looking for the benefits of a heavy cream but with a lightweight texture should give it a go. I used it every night for a week but didn't notice any differences, even superficial upon waking, except that my skin was well-hydrated (which is something). I think this is the second time I've tried it u2014 now with more to combat u2014 and liked it but wasn't sure I'd found a keeper. It's unscented and non-irritating.

I received this as a sample and tried it just for fun as a night cream.  The first night I woke up in the morning with skin smooth and even--and my skin has never been like that.  After two weeks of use, my skin is radiant and healthy--I've received numerous compliments from family and friends.  This is uncharted territory for me because my skin is usually sensitive, dry, and acne-prone.  Can't recommend this product highly enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually got the 100 point size of this thinking it would be perfect as an eye cream. It is such a cute little container and will last forever, it kind of has a wet foam like texture. It smells like snickerdoodles (dunkaroos anyone). It is not very moisturizing and my eyes feel a little tight in the morning. Maybe it is a little harsh for my eyes but so far I am pretty happy with my free eye cream and hope it does make a difference (its been about 12 days).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't write many reviews, but I got a sample of this with my rewards points and it is truly the best smelling cream I've ever tried. I'm 35 and have been a product junkie since 15. I've got  allergies/sensitivities to everything, but this did not bother me one bit. Smell can be described as a hint of coconut.. but not your typical coconut scent.. not overpowering or fake smelling either. Literally in love upon opening the jar.  As far as the cream itself, I need serious intense hydration and this wasn't doing that for me. It's not promoted as that anyway so I'm not knocking it for that. Seems to be a good all around cream with a heavenly light scent but a tad pricey.

reviews.review_title: Took me a few days to like it
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a new skin care routine since I just entered my 30's and was planning on going for natural products but couldn't help but try the sample of this... The texture was weird at first, but then I realized you just have to dip a couple of fingers in and that tiny bit will go a long way.  It's so incredibly moisturizing and healed up some dry spots on my face that I had been picking at.  Some Algenist products smell horrible in my opinion but I like the smell of this moisturizer.  The only problem is there are some ingredients I don't like.

reviews.review_title: Saving up to purchase the full sized
reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product and I loved it. I think it smells like a horchata (YUM). I have been using this for a week as a night time moisturizer. This was smart of them to sample out, now I am hooked and need to save up to buy the 2oz. my sample is still over 1/2 way full and I have been using it for a week, so I imagine this 2oz will last a long time as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this review is based solely off of the sample I got,  but it was so good that  I will be purchasing this cream in the near future.Since I have combo skin leaning towards oily I always apply creams at night. This cream lifted my skin and and it really helped my under eyes tone up. I know it's not for under the eyes, but it made a huge difference on my dark circles.

It smells so good and feels good on the skin. I wore it under my makeup and my skin looked porcelain (also used smash box photo finish primer) but with this moisturizer it looked way better. I'm obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this, my skin doesn't feel soft. Even when I use a TINY amount, it feels like there's a layer of something on my skin. Not what I look for in a moisturizer. Received a deluxe sample; wouldn't buy it.  On the other hand, you don't need much, so it'll last forever if you like it.

I had nothing else on my skin and after this moisturizer had been on my face and set, if you touch your face it will roll up.  It feels nice, but even the CEO moisturizer is way better than this.  I would never think of putting this Algenist moisturizer under makeup.
