reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not happy that my skin broke out. Also, the product had an unpleasant scent and had a stiff, resistant texture. Would not recommend.

I have been using this for a month straight now. I used many samples of it prior but was always shy to lay down the cash for the full size. I don't regret it. The anti-aging effects are noticeable, my skin is perfectly moisturized. It seems to help even my skin tone and give me a natural glow as well. It has not helped my hormonal acne, but has not worsened it either. It does exactly what it says it will. I love it.
another great company! ladies this product can be used everyday and just makes that face so lovely. I got as a sample and feel in love.

This little guy evens out my skin tone and minimizes pores. It's not greasy and absorbs super well on my very dry skin(this is summer). I haven't used it for a very long time so I can't comment on other anti-aging effects, but fo far I really like it as a face cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The stuff makes my skin GLOW when I wake up! It improves dullness and imperfections within a matter of minutes, and over time this cream does what it is promised. I have been working solely off samples though - it's SO overpriced that I can't bring myself to buy it but am enjoying it while it lasts!
Over all its hydrating, does the trick. But i dislike the smell, its weird and throws me off.  If it had a better scent i would give it 4 stars.

I got the sample and have been using this for almost 5 days now twice daily. I know someone else you don't get a lot of use out of it but I don't think u need much, mines still looking half full. I have a pretty oily skin, I get greasy in the matter of hours. I've used so many moisturizers and oils before that I either had bad reactions to and got some acne because of it or my skin was still greasy when I woke up. My skin DOES NOT look greasy nor oily when I wake up, just looks plumped and hydrated. I haven't seen a lot of difference in my forehead lines but I wasn't expecting to see results that quick so I'm not complaining.   Another remark, a lot of people are complaining about the smell, honestly I don't even smell it. Smell doesn't bug me. Hopefully if my skin keeps looking great will definitely buy the full size.
I received as a sample and used this 3 mornings in a row. It worked well as a moisturizer under makeup and absorbs well in the skin.
Received a sample of this product. Seemed to sink into the skin well and didn't leave me with a weird residue in the morning which was great. However, I just cannot get over the horrible smell!

Not sure if it's a bad sample but I found it smelled rather rancid.  It absorbed quickly and moisturized reasonably well but I had to wash it off - couldn't handle the funky, rancid smell. I'm curious to check out the full size product in store, in case it was just a bad sample.

reviews.review_title: EVERYTHING I WANT IN A MOISTURIZER!!!!!
reviews.review_text: I rarely write a review, but first impressions of this cream demanded it. In the last year alone I've tried La Mer, Shiseido, Belif, Drunk Elephant, Clinique, Murad and the list goes on, while there have been other moisturizers I've enjoyed, none have blown me away like this one. Everybody's skin is different, what works for some may be disastrous for others, (always ask for a sample, or start with a trial size) but for my combination skin this is amazing. After the very first use I woke up with moisturized, plump, silky skin!! The best part, I was 50% less oily in my t-zone, and that is a big deal for me. In the evening after cleansing, I applied the Algenist Power pressed serum, waited a couple of minutes,  and applied this. While the consistency may seem odd at first, you start patting it into your skin and it literally melts into the silkiest texture that your skin will drink up!! If this continues working well for me then I think I've finally found my HG moisturizer! Give it a shot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample, so I cannot comment on the over-all longtime use benefits.  I can say (as someone with oil-combo skin and in their 30s)... 1) Has a vanilla meets plastic smell. 2) Thick cream but... 3) absorbs rather nicely. Would be a nice consistency as an evening cream.   The smell really bugs me, but I'm sure that's just preference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cream for over a year, and my skin looks fabulous. I have oily skin that tends to develop pimples from heavier creams, and this cream causes no reactions whatsoever. Fine lines are eliminated, deeper wrinkles are noticeably reduced, and my skin has a wonderful soft, even texture. I use this in conjunction with the pressed night serum, and people tell me I look 10 years younger than I am.

I used a one use sample so I can't speak to it's efficacy but my skin feels nice after using. However, I would never buy this product due to the strong scent of mildewy towels. It's smells like I stuck my face in someone's old gym bag or a towel that's been used a thousand times and never washed or dried properly.

I only got a sample of this, so I only used it twice. Sure, it makes your skin soft, but I didn't really see any change in my skin, and honestly, for that price, I better see a difference right away. That being said, I'm 26, so I don't know how it works on wrinkles.

So I got the little sample of this and my god that little sample did wonders for my forehead wrinkles and I got about 4 uses out of that sample size, the smell is kinda funky, chemicalish and if you don't like tight feeling on your skin you won't like this. Also I'm only 20 so my wrinkles aren't severe so I don't know how it would work on someone older.

used up two jar of 30ml( bought the sets) and didn't see anything. literally nothing. for something that price i expect at least be hydrating enough, but nope didn't feel like skin is even plumped a little bit. pores, discoloration, skin texture, dryness, fine lines( due to dryness) nothing changed at all. very disappointed.  texture is like very soft feta cheese, smells like mash mellows. doesn't interrupt with makeup. works with many other brand and no peelings and crumbling.   yet, I still expect to see or feel the results of such expensive cream.

I got a sample of this with an order, was able to get 2 uses out of it which I don't think is enough time to see results as is intended. So this product was just okay for me, didn't stand out to me as anything special. The consistency was sort of surprising to me, it looked more like a serum than a cream when I squeezed it from the little sample pouch. I didn't have any negative effects though. Based on price and it did not change my life instantly I won't be running out to buy the full size.
Smells amazing. I saw results in just a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: works great on skin but the texture is nothing like the sample i got - i don't know if they changed something? but the one i got was like curdled yogurt. my husband thinks it smells like cintronella (his words - bugspray) so that's a big fail. i smell marshmallows and a hint of vanilla.

I've had the deluxe sample for a month now and I still have another months worth. This cream is amazing and if you like horchata you will LOVE the scent of this cream !  It's soooo soft and almost has a buttery whipped cream consistency  I use this over the power wrinkle serum and it just acts like a barrier to keep your oils or serums locked in and it definitely smooths out your skin. I'm 27 and the only concerning small winkle is above my forehead by my hairline from raising my eyebrows and this has helped smooth it out and it gives your face some life. If you have oily or dry skin try this cream out.
I love this product so much! Would recommend to anyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in my Beauty Insider bag for 500 pts and I am so happy I did. Seriously the softest most moisturizing cream I have ever used and has a great smell. It soaks in nicely and when I wake up my skin is so soft and dewy. Absolutely pleased with only a few uses. Using alongside the Algenist eye cream and lifting serum. In love. The price is steep for me so using alternately with Ponds AHA Cream to save on cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cream by far has been the BEST cream i have come across in recent times. It has checked all the boxes for my needs. I must say i have oily, sensitive skin. These cream is extremely light-weight and soothing for the skin. It is extremely hydrating as well, one application per day does the job. The problem i constant have with every other moisturizer i have tried is that my skin feels dry after 20 minutes and it gets extremely oily. But this moisturizer does not live my skin wanting more hydration and best of all I don't look oily even after a long day at work! Truly incredible, and although slightly expensive, it is worth every dime. I use this along with the eye balm by Alienist as well.

I first tried this from a sample which lasted me 5 days. After the first day I immediately saw a difference. I'm 41 and have fine lines around my eyes. After 3 days the lines were much less visible. It's a thick cream but worked well with my oily skin. I've read comments regarding the scent. Personally, it smells like a piu00f1a colada to me. I loved how my skin looked after 5 days so purchased the full size and have no regrets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin, thin and reactive, not with breakouts. This doesn't give me a rash, works very well, and smells nice. It only got 4 stars because the price is ridiculous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first I didn't like this. Its thick and hard to use. The consistency reminded me of an old cold cream. How wrong I was. Experimenting with application quickly revealed that this stuff is AMAZING when applied when skin is at its most absorptive - either with hyd. acid OR right out of the shower, pores open, skin still warm and gently patted dry.  I've used up one pot and I'm back for more. Unreal stuff. If you're not getting the results you want, try experimenting. Everyone is different.

I waited until I used this product for a few months to write a review. This has made my skin look younger and plumper. I've used almost every anti-aging moisturizer around the $100 mark and this is hands down the best I've found.

I love Algenist products and bought this to add to my Algenist arsenal. Unfortunately, I was so disappointed. The smell and texture of this cream is just so decadent but after going through half of the pot over a month long period I did not see any results and gave it to a friend to try.  For the price, I assumed it would be worth it, as this brand has never failed me in the past. But for me, it worked only as a normal moisturizer- which I could purchase at a much lesser cost. I didn't notice any glow, change in skin texture and tone, or reduction of fine lines.  I still plan to continue to use other Algenist products, but this one was not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many different moisturizers and always return to this one. Makes my skin very smooth. Has a nice light fragrance too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sits on top of skin and peels and flakes off. Disappointed in this product from a brand I usually like.

Came back to using this after trying other moisturizers for a couple months. Using this and the genius serum and noticed such a difference within a month. I got ID'd twice now. Im 40 in 2 weeks. So yeah.. BIG difference in overall texture, dewiness and lack of visible wrinkles.

I'm just looking for an effective serum. This is it. I'm using for a while now and it works. I still look young and I'm using this as a preventive measure. I'm 38 and I still get mistaken for being early college age 22 is the highest. I was traveling for about a month and did not replenish. I could tell the difference in my skin. Glad I'm back on track. By the way my skin tends to be oily if I use the wrong items however this keeps my skin soft and supple, radiant and smooth. And it really does work very well with other products. Great value.

Every so often I decide to venture out and try a new moisturizer. I use genius at night. The texture is whipped and not to heavy but very hydrating. I started using this on a 10 day sample and noticed my skin looked brighter and smoother. This is probably my 6th jar. I keep coming back to it because it does what it says. I did take a star away because Algenist snuck in a small price increase along with some of there other products.

This one did not work for me.  I did not like the textue and did nothing for me skin.  Many really like it, so maybe just my skin.  i was disappointed with this purchase.  I will finish because expensive, but will not repurchase.  To many good products available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For me I found that it helped my skin and wrinkles I am 74 and my skin looks pretty good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Had to return. Did not really moisturize. Caused my nonreactive skin to become sensitive. Very heavily perfumed. I really hated this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product with the face wash and eye cream and it is very hydrating. I have found when you are using several like I am it is best to allow things to absorb. Some reviewers have claimed it clumps under make up. My response is it hadn't fully absorbed. The cream is very think with a gel like quality. It is made from algae so thickness should not be a surprise. I started using this as a night cream because of how thick it is. I love it.

This has been such a disappointment. After spending quite a lot on the serum and cream and after about 2 month daily use I found that it is not moisturizing at all, it actually made my face feel dry, there is no improvement whatsoever, on the opposite I noticed more uneven skin tone, etc than before. The cream itself is not creamy but somehow clumpy and cakes under make up. It doesn't make my skin feels greasy but if I move my fingers over my face after it dries on skin it comes off in clumps. I am surprised at the positive reviews as this was such a waste of money for such a bad product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe it's cuz whatever wrinkles I had probably weren't serious (i.e. deep set)  but I'm 26 and since using this (started December last year) with the Power serum (been using this for over 6 months now), people think I'm an 18/19 yr old high school student!  Didn't know how well they were working until my mother commented on my face. I had a terrible habit of drinking through straws which aided the frown lines developing on my face, little bit of undereye and crowfeet lines... they are all gone now, no sign of them at all. WIN!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best moisturizer I have used. Have been a loyal fan of Algenist serums and Genius line, including the moisturizer for over 2 years. Other brands cannot match the results. I am 55 and this product keeps my skin looking young.

reviews.review_title: The one sample that changed my skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a gazillion samples. They all have small effects-good or bad. Algenist at one time had a 10 pack sample that I was lucky enough to receive. Each time I used one, the next morning my skin was amazing. I tend to have hormonal acne and dry patches. I feel like I am constantly trying to balance the moisture in my skin without breaking out. This it the ONE cream that moisturizes, re-balances and even makes the breakout go away. The price reflects the function of this cream. THE only other cream I could compare this to is Sea Creations. This is luxury at less the half the price! Great gift for your mom too! Can't recommend this cream enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know where to begin with all the things I like about this cream. The consistency is whipped. It has a heavenly scent. I don't need very much of it. And my skin is oily in the T zone, normal elsewhere and it doesn't make me any oilier. I don't know what kind of magical micro algae these biochemists discovered or are cultivating, but I can appreciate the results on my 40 year old skin. Nobody ever thinks I'm 40. I constantly get compliments on my skin. It's fantastic!!!

I started off using the Algenist Genius Ultimate Anti-Aging Vitamin C+ Serum and fell in love. After 1 month, I started to see the texture of skin improve. It was softer and even the pores seemed smaller. I decided to try the cream and this definitely added to the great benefits the serum was giving me. It is a thick cream, so it is great for night time to moisturize and nourish the skin.  I'm loving both of the serum and the cream together.

This face cream is by far one of the best I have ever used anyone who is dry will love this product. It keeps my skin hydrated all day long and the anti aging benefits help too. Algenist uses algae in most of there products so I can see why the results are so amazing it's a must for anyone serious about amping up there skincare to a new level.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I grabbed this from my mother (50&Fab) who LOVES it on her creases and swells... For me (20ish) it was hydrating and intensive. I have combo-oily skin but it dryed out from another product and this cream rescued me! It is very thick but absorbs well when it is worked in, but WORK IT IN!!! I can say my moms skin looks balanced and bright, and she has used cream 1x daily for months. I have been using  it daily for about 3 weeks and my skin is hydrated and refreshed, with no breakouts! I don't have severe dark spots or scarring from acne but some shadowing and the cream has made these shadows less visible ( might be the moisture plump, but looks good)! Hope these 2 views help !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cream for a month and i notice the difference. My face is brighter and lighter in color and soft. Even though the price is on the higher end, i think you get your bang for your buck. Try it and if it does not work out for you, you can refund it within 30 days. I love this cream.

I use this right after my algenist repairing oil. I did buy their serum and a kit that included this, the oil, the eye balm, and the gentle cleanser. That kit was a steal. After using two drops of oil a little of this cream goes a long way. For the last year I have experienced over oily nose and forehead and dry cheeks that were flaking and scaly. I could see the flakes and scales under my bb cream and foundation. I honestly tried so many different products to correct this over the last year and found many failures and a few products I liked. Murad Hydro-Dynamic Ultimate Moisture not only broke me out but did not help my dry scaly patches. This product is fast absorbing and actually moisturizes. I almost didn't buy this product line because I was so skeptical and after researching it I couldn't find any outside reviews by dermatologists or estheticians that were positive. I decided to try it anyway because so many can't love it if it works so horribly and I am very glad I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the samples I got! I used them while on a trip to San Francisco (the low humidity of California giving my face the look of a weather-beaten cowgirl -- but oh hey, samples in my makeup bag!), and three days of use convinced me to cough up the money for a full jar.  A little goes a long way, as the pricing suggests. Unfortunately, I don't think I'll buy it again unless it comes with a sensible applicator. Using too much of it is just a waste of good ingredients (and gives my face a strange -- not oily, mind you -- sheen), but its weird gel-like tacky texture captures all the dust (and skin cells, I'm sure) from your fingers, making the daily experience rather repulsive. Perhaps I would feel differently had I used a butter knife as an applicator from the start. Sadly, I think that experience ruined it for me.
Love genius cream. Can't live without. Hydrating, wonderful under tinted moisturizer, slight vanilla fragrance, and doesn't bother my over sensitive eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: nice feeling on the face easy to use lightweight not heavy feeling, just feels light and comfortable
Absolutely love this stuff!!! Best money I have ever spent!!!

reviews.review_title: Wow is all I can say
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I put this on for the first time and thought Oh dear. Look how greasy my skin is, but thought I should give it a minute to absorb, so I brushed my teeth. When I finished, I looked again and it had totally absorbed. Crazy. Put on my makeup over it and I am glowing. It is beautiful. Love this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I splurged and bought my second jar of this cream. My skin has never felt so hydrated. You must try this we'll keep secret to glowingly radiant skin!

reviews.review_title: so far I haven't seen an improvement
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the cream is definitely moisturizing my face but I'm not seeing any difference in the wrinkles. I still have a lot left so I can tell it's a good quality and maybe once I'm finished with the bottle I'll notice a difference by then.

This product hydrates and smells nice but a minute after applying it when I start applying make up this product creates junk that rubs off. I have to wait for the cream to absorb and then wipe my face off to get the debris before applying makeup.

My skin is acne prone, fair, and can be sensitive to certain chemicals. I just turned 30 and for the last year have been looking for good pre-emptive anti-aging products that didn't clog my pores. I love this moisturizer. I only use a very small amount and it covers my whole face and neck. I hve not had breakouts due to this product. It does have a vanilla smell so if you are sensitive to fragrance do not buy this. I happen to LOVE the scent. I use this am and pm. I have noticed my skin's overall texture and elasticity have improved a LOT.

I really like this product. I use it in conjunction with Algenist Power Wrinkle Fighter. I'm in my early 30s so this is more preventative but there's definitely a visible difference. I've been a fan of Algenist for years...and def saw a difference when I stopped using the products. The texture is weird but goes on fine. Haven't found anything that I like better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best moisturizer I've ever used. It isn't heavy feeling - in fact it's almost a whipped texture. But my skin is smooth, soft, brighter, and more even. It just looks amazing. Only negative is the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this as a sample first and loved the results. Bought the full size two weeks ago and have been really impressed. Not only has it helped reduce the fine lines on my face, but it has drastically improved a deep crease/wrinkle on my neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I went all in and bought the larger jar after reading about it online and am so happy I did. I use it in the morning right after washing my face and again before bed and have noticeably clearer, healthier looking skin in the ten-ish (
H's good on my skin. Makes my face more brighter & refined in the morning.

reviews.review_title: Not good for my combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a 10 day sample of this, for which I'll be grateful. The product did not work well for my skin (olive tone, combination--very oily in the oil zone). I agree that the smell is also intrusive and unpleasant.  I'd think twice about the brightening mask now too. Would definitely sample before buying.

reviews.review_title: A wonderful solution for tired, dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say that I have one of the worst types of skin that there is: oily and prone to breakouts, yet dry and sensitive at the same time. It's hard to find a product that can provide adequate moisture without making my skin feel greasy, irritating it or just causing a breakout. Enter the Genius Cream. Yes, it is pricey, but worth every penny. And honestly, I could feel the difference within minutes of applying it, so if you're on the fence, try the sample before splurging on the buy (did I mention that it's pricey)? Has it transformed my skin into perfection? Well, no, but I'm past the age of chasing that dream. All I want is something that feels like dessert on my face and that's exactly how I feel using this cream. Speaking of dessert, you may not be into this product if you're sensitive to scented products--this cream definitely has a strong, vanilla-infused aroma, that I personally love, but realize many other people might not, so worth the mention.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Expensive? Yes, but worth it if you have dry sensitive skin. I have been using this day and night for three weeks and have seen a great improvement in the texture of my skin. And I LOVE the scent. I use the very smallest amount possible because I want to make this last, as I can't go spending this much on a moisturizer every other month, and it absorbs into my skin almost immediately. In the morning I follow with my sunscreen and have no problems with it feeling oily. Now, granted, my skin is dry, but I really love everything I have tried from this company and look forward to trying more products in the future.

Look, at my age I do not expect a miracle out of a jar. Good skin care basically comes from a good diet. I have spent my share for the Algenist and other brand lines, but this product does absolutely NOTHING for my skin, except lay like a very heavy cream that dries up and becomes soooo gritty, that my face feels dirty about 15 minutes after an application! A RIDICULOUS PRICE FOR A WORTHLESS PRODUCT. PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY FOR THIS ONE!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a deluxe sample of this product for a while and decided to use it because the weather is getting cooler. The cream smells very artificial vanilla. It has that typical night cream smell. It flaked as soon as it started to soak in. Another cream has done this to me as well. Very disappointing.

I noticed an instant glow and bounce to my skin after the first time using it. It has been a month and I still love it just as much as I did the first time I tried it. Worth every penny. So stop reading and buy it!!! You won't be sorry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Algenist cream for a while but decided to try the Genius version the last time I was in the store. Used along with the Genius eye cream & Retinol serum, my skin looks wonderful, this is the best trio I've found. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I use the Algenist tinted moisturizer but it doesn't absorb over the Genius cream as well. It stays more on the surface instead of blending in, leaving little clumps around the edges that then need removed. So far the benefits have outweighed this annoyance though.

I have been loving Algenists lifting and firming cream so thought I would give this a try. Lifting and Firming is FAR superior in my opinion. This did not absorb quickly and felt a bit tacky in my oily skin. The scent was overly sweet. I love most Algenist products but this one just wasn't for me.

It is frankly embarrassing how many products I've tried and this is the first one I've seen fit to review. It is simply amazing. The consistency is light but substantial enough to provide excellent moisturizing overnight and year around. I have combination skin that tends towards oiliness, but I can use this under makeup during the day without getting shiny by the end of the day. I am in my thirties and have noticed it has helped with wrinkles and possibly with dark spots too. My twin sister actually asked me if I had engaged in any cosmetic surgery after I had been using it for several months. It doesn't hurt that it smells like chocolate chip cookies either. It rocks, nuff said.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not sure if there are actually any anti-aging benefits...I have been using this product for about 6 months and I noticed an improvement of lines within first couple weeks, but none after that time. I am still re-purchasing though as this feels great on my skin, I am less prone to breakouts (almost never since using this product), my complexion is smoother and as I mentioned earlier this product feels great on my skin...I have developed sensitive skin over the past 2 years and this stuff calms my skin down and leaves it feeling hydrated and plump without the shine or oiliness that some hydrating moisturizers can leave behind...plus, I love the smell and the light whipped feeling of this cream
This cream took 5 years off. I started noticing results 3 weeks in.... I just look younger, my skin is smoother, fuller. This product delivered against the claims.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in the kit with the cleanser and eye cream because I wasn't sure if I wanted to shell out $100 for the cream itself. Well I am now!! Some have complained about the smell but it doesn't bother me at all and dissipates quickly. The results are too good to pass up!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I use it in the evening before I go to bed, and I wake up with soft, plump skin. But, it never leaves me feeling greasy or oily. I actually stopped using it for a while to try a couple of samples of moisturizer that should be equivalent based on their description, and they don't hold a candle to this stuff. I have a new bottle I will be opening soon, and I can't wait.

I'm 34 and grew up in the sun. I've been using Algenist for 3 years and the short periods of time I have stopped I've had lackluster skin.  These products make my skin **glow** and even out my skin tone.  SPF 50 this product day and night.  I am a doubter and trust me these products work. Give it 30 days and you will glow.

I'm so in love with this moisturizer! It leaves my skin hydrated without being greasy. Other reviews says it smells like vanilla cupcake....but to me it had a muted Cinnabon smell. To some this may be a negative but it's a positive for me! I don't mind the smell as long as the product isn't sticky like a Cinnabon! After 5-10 minutes of wearing it I don't even notice a smell. Only negative is the price...so I suggest buying it in a kit!

I've never found another moisturizer that hits the balance of what I need so perfectly. (And given the price point: believe me, I've tried.) It's not heavy, but I'm not sure I'd call it lightweight either? It feels unlike any of the other creams I've tried. My skin very often reacts badly to a number of products, even those for sensitive skin, but this moisturizer is always soothing, and never irritating. I've sometimes put it on after something else irritates my face, and it helped soothe that too. With this, my skin feels soft and smooth, without ever being overwhelmed by the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a light, almost gellike texture which sinks into your skin. Each week, my skin looks better and less aging.

reviews.review_title: Ma peau est eclatante et bien hydratee
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Avant, j'utilisais Dior, que j'aimais bien, mais depuis que j'utilise Algenist, J'ADORE!!! Ma peau est souple, eclatante, lumineuse, douce. J'adore cette creme. J'ai achete le serum mais ne l'ai pas encore essaye puisque je terminais le serum Dior... J'ai hu00e2te de voir l'effet que les 2 produits combines fera!

reviews.review_title: Want to smell like VANILLA CUPCAKE?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never even made it to put this on my face... So bummed! Just be aware that the fragrance is STRONG (why?) and smells just like you've stuck your nose into a cupcake with tons of cloyingly sweet vanilla frosting. It was overwhelming enough that it went right back in the box to be returned. If your into that kind of smell, this may be a great cream. I'll never know. I wanted to love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this at night since there is no SPF in it. Absorbs quickly, very hydrating. There is a very distinct, sweet smell to it so itu2019s not for anyone who is fragrance adverse.

I have been using this for about 3 months and I love, love LOVE this stuff. I feel like it really imparts a radiance to my skin, and the scent reminds me of cocoa beans. My new favorite! #aurevoirLu00e5ncome

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I beauty gift set and this product was in it. All I have to say is that it works wonders! I have dry skin after washing, but once I apply it works as a great moisturizer, as well as a anti-aging cream. I definitely noticed the difference. Also, had NO IDEA how expensive it is to purchase. Even the small container is expensive. So I have to say I got it as a steal when I bought the $40.00 gift set. I think I will end up buying the pump. For the money it is worth it! I last long and little go al very long way!
Nice moisturizer, not heavily perfumed, goes on smoothly, works well under make up and over their retinol serum. Hydration lasts all day. Skin feels really good when using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is currently my favorite moisturizer overall. It's light textured with an unobtrusive scent and provides just the right amount of moisture without feeling overly oily. Penetrates skin quickly. I use it over serums day and night and have seen an improved quality to my skin with no breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a deluxe sample of this some time ago, loved, but didn't purchase due to price. Since that time I've gone through 4 other moisturizers with just average results. So I decided to bite the bullet, stop shopping around, and go back to this. SO glad I did. I just love this stuff. Goes on wonderfully, absorbs quickly, moisturizes all day. And just gives me a wonderful glow. In fact, I've had two compliments in the past two days on my glowing skin. I'm done shopping around!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample with a recent purchase and instantly loved it. It's light, fast absorbing, and smells great. Plus, I've noticed a considerable difference in my skin. I use this at night after I wash my face and wake up with smoother skin and a more even tone. I was hesitant to purchase because it is in the pricey side, but since you don't need a lot every time you use it, I figured I'd get my money's worth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has always been dry esp in winter but ever since I used genius my skin looks & feels hydrated, even my friend noticed & she got the same product for herself

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin, and this cream has been wonderful so far. My red patches have cleared up and I've had no breakouts. This cream is not too rich but very moisturizing. The texture is a little strange but it smells great, it absorbs well and makes my skin feel smooth and soft. It's still too early to tell how this cream rates as an anti-aging cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as a day cream. My skin is somewhat combo/dry and I was seeing black heads from my previous face cream. This is a richer cream but it is not heavy once it has been applied. It soaks into the skin without any oily residue. I have seen a huge improvement in the moisture of my skin. No more dry patches and the black heads have ceased. (I had to get a facial with extractions to get rid of the pesky ones before I started using this skin care regime full time)

reviews.review_title: Pricey as heck, and worth it so far!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this twice a day for two months and I see an enormous improvement in my dry, flaky, sensitive (rosacea) skin. No more flakes, fine dry lines are diminished, and my skin just looks BETTER all over - smoother, softer, glow-y-er. I still have that line between my brows, my sun spots aren't fading, and I don't believe in miracle products in general, but this is as close as I've come so far to something drastically improving my skin. However, I started using it just as the horribly dry, frigid winter was ending, so the change of seasons could have contributed to my skin looking better so quickly. That said, I love it enough to continue using it, and when winter comes around again (when my skin usually is at its worst!) I will know for sure how well this works. For now, I'm loving it and glad I tried it! (I'm also using the Genius Anti-Aging Eye Cream and the Genius Ultimate Anti-Aging Vitamin C+ Serum - love them all!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff rocks. I recommend that you try it. I decided to give it a shot & I'm SO HAPPY that I did. It absolutely does help with elasticity and I particularly needed help with that. BTW, I'm easily able to use it around my eyes. I'd love to try the eye cream too but this stuff is a little bit pricey so I started with just face cream. I think the eye cream adds the appearance of luster to the eye area (I tried both things on in the store before purchasing) and I'm not sure what other benefits it might add to the eye area other that that. But this product is UNSCENTED and I find it doesn't irritate my eye area at all.

This has been my go to moisturizer for a few years now and I absolutely love this product. How it feels, how it smells, how it makes my face look. I just cannot live without this product. It may be pricey but it is well worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a rich moisturizer that I use at night with the Algenist Genius Serum. I've had less issues with dry, flaky spots on my face since using these products together. A little goes a long way so the jar will last a long time. I have oily skin but this moisturizer doesn't make that worse. I highly recommend this moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I'm only 23 but after having a sample of this I'm hooked. It totally calms my acne and everything heals quicker and old hyperpigmentation is fading so much faster. My skin surrounding my breakouts is smooth,plump and clear looking.I would complain about the price,but since I can use this day and night it replaces having two different moisturizers. Plus a little goes a long way. Also it smells like icing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this cream for a few weeks. My skin felt abit tight and dry after using it. I do not think it had enough moisture for my skin. I was excited about the anti aging benefits but did not like the feel of the cream on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this first as part of the rewards kit then as the full size. I love it. I do think it has improved the resiliency of my skin and it leaves my face feeling soft. I also really love the smell of the cream. The texture does feel odd at first but it works like any other cream. I think it may even be lightweight enough for summer (so far has worked well for the end of winter and spring).

reviews.review_title: Took A While To Love It
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I've been using this for about a year now and I've had a love hate relationship with this product until I figured out how to use it. I don't use it in the morning unless I'm housebound for the day as it tends to make me look like a grease ball within a few hours. So instead I use it at night along with the rest of my routine before I go to bed and I wake up with my skin feeling soft and healthy. I notice a huge difference when I don't use this product so I will continue to use it until something else comes on the market.
i'm disappointed with this as the girl in sephora gave me such high hopes. didn't moisturise my winter skin at all.

Great for any skin. Feels rich th en absorbs in. My flakiness is gone, my skin is glowing. I am only 25 but i see the effects this moisturizer can give for my stressed out skin. I have a glow, I am hydrated, i am happy! Feels JUST FINE in the summer even when I should be getting oily it keeps my skin in check always!!

My skin is slightly temperamental and has been known to break out or become irritated with new products. I never had a breakout with this. My skin is brighter, softer, more radiant then it has been in years. I have only written maybe 3 other reviews

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The first product I have ever purchase that made a significant change in my skin, very moisturizing and evens the skin tone. My laser doctor even wanted to know what I was using so she could buy some!

I mean I'm 20 so I definitely wouldn't buy this but I do have a sample jar that was given to me and I really do like this product. It keeps my skin feeling great. Maybe it'll keep me looking 20 in 20 years haha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product that I have used for about a year. I use it at night after applying my serum. I believe in the benefits of the alguronic acid as I have used several Algenist products for several yrs. now. I use their eye creams for both day & night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wasn't sure I like the dense consistency, especially with summer coming. I got a sample of the Lift and Firm cream and like it better...works well and is lighter. I may try this again at some point, but didn't feel it was worth the large cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample and I love it. I have red, dry patches on my face and this product works great. It absorbed quickly and left my face feeling soft. It has a wonderful light scent, almost like a marshmallow treat. Its a pleasant smell and it did not irritate my skin at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this because I received a sample. I just was using it at night. In the morning my face was firm, smooth, soft, glowing. I absolutely love this moisturizer. I've started using it during the day. I wasn't sure how that would be seeing that I have normal to oily skin. I just used a little less and my makeup goes on flawlessly. Ordered the full size jar.

reviews.review_title: Not as good as the firming & lifting cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Too thick and doesn't absorb into skin as well as the firming & lifting cream. I decided to try this out after I fell in love with the lifting & firming cream.  I figured with the thicker consistency and anti aging properties that the price difference between this one and the lifting one would be worth it, but I was wrong! This moisturizer was way to thick and didnt absorb into my dry skin no matter all the different ways I tried applying it.  Save yourself some money and buy the lifting & firming cream instead!
Kudos to Algenist !! This product is great ! Tried sample couldn't wait to purchase. I have sensitive skin and this really works.

I tried the sample before and I like the smell... For that, price is hefty but very nice to know it is helping my skin through the night to maintain moisture! I just started the nightly routine with this cream so hope it's a keeper!
This is the best (sorry Caudalie). I have just started using this line

Ok, I have used this cream for 2 years and I cannot rave enough about it. My face looks like it's been sprayed by the fountain of youth. I have naturally extremely dry, sensitive, eczema prone skin. But ever since I started using this cream I have the smoothest, tightest, most glowing skin. I am 37 and I have better skin than some 20 year olds. Its never itchy or uncomfortable. I only have to use a tiny amount, as the jellylike texture spreads easily. One bar lasted me about 9 months. I only put it on once in the evening as my skin is fine without more. So in the end it not only turns out to be the best cream I have ever used but also the cheapest :-)

reviews.review_title: Crossing the hormonal threshold? Yes, please
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you've just started feeling the effects of being a woman of a certain age, - that is, your skin looks oily during the day but feels dry and tight at night, this is the moisturizer for you. It goes on light, but is extremely hydrating - I can wear it at night and during the day. I know they say not to put it around your eyes, but I can't resist - I don't need eye creme when I use it. This is my go-to, my big great skin secret, my favorite moisturizer ever. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using this the last week so I can't comment yet on the long-term effects. But short term, this cream is a great texture and feels 'firm' going on. The next morning my skin felt refreshed. And the fragrance: I'm in LOVE with it. To me it smells like vanilla coconut custard. It's not a heavy smell. Very light but I could eat it. :)

I haven't noticed any difference so far in regards to the lines etc, but I find there just isn't enough moisture for my Normal to Normal Dry skin. It has a pleasant vanilla scent, but why do they need to add scent at all?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is one of the best I have used, and I have used several. I notice a real difference in my skin after using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can only say I didn't find anything special about this product. Sure, it's a good moisturizer, but I was hoping to have better results for fine || lines above my lip. The smell that others refer to didn't really bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't believe I finally found a wrinkle cream that actually works. I saw a noticeable difference in my fine lines and wrinkles in the first week!!!! I have tried every cream on the market and this is the winner. I love the feel and smell too.

reviews.review_title: I will die with this on my face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin recently started to react to the cold weather. In addition to that, I wanted to really start taking care of my face, neck and chest. I don't tend to get breakouts, but I very often will have a quick breakout if my face doesn't like a product. My face LOVES this product. It cured my dryness, and it really does make my face look and feel amazing. I wear makeup maybe once or twice a week, and the other day, my husband told me that my makeup made me look like i had a dewy glow (He's heard me talk about makeup before..haha). I wasn't wearing makeup, and I'm positive that this product is the glow he was seeing. I cannot recommend this enough. Very minimal smell, does not go on sticky and absorbs very well. It does not feel thick, and for me, it did not cause any breakouts or leave my skin oily. This must be made of heaven, its just so lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this as a 10-day sample and went back for the full bottle. I have been using this for about a year now. I have super sensitive combination skin and this goes on creamy and smooth. No reactions, no breakouts. My skin feels like silk. I don't believe it has done anything to soften the lines that are forming but my skin is super soft and my makeup goes on easy after applying. A little goes a long way - one container lasts about 2 months. I just wish it wasn't so expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's expensive, it smells kinds weird, but who cares? After two applications I could already tell the difference - tighter more youthful looking skin. Very moisturizing, probably best as a night cream. GREAT results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good! It's like buttercream frosting. And that is the opposite of what I assumed it would be like (algae, the ocean, seaweed...). The texture is almost jelly like. It gives my face the perfect amount of dewiness without grease and breakouts. I have my period now and I haven't even broke out, which has never happened before. It's ironic that I ended up loving this so much because when I bought it, I was convinced that I would end up returning it because for the price it had better be the best face cream I've ever used. And now I can say it is the best face cream I have ever used!

Got this product as part of a ten day sample pack. I've been using it twice a day after washing. It has worked wonders on my skin. I'm 34 with the start of fine wrinkles in forehead and around eyes. After three days my skin is brighter fresher more even and the best part is that my fine lines have totally smoothed out. The price tag is seriously frightening especially since my husband endulges as well. I've noticed that I can get two applications out of one sample pack so a little goes a very long way. Smells great too and I usually am very sensitive to fragrance but this is really nice.

This is the first face cream I used that has actually made a difference! My fine lines are less noticeable and a scar I had is fading. A little goes a long way and it's not greasy, makes your skin feel so smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy, good moisturizer but not heavy - you do not need much. My skin is softer and looks better. Love it for daytime. The price is higher than most, but it goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this, it is not heavy and my mature skin is already seeing a difference, if feels good when you put it on. I use it at night before I go to bed.

I was trying to avoid paying a high price for skincare anymore but gave in. It hadn't been 10 weeks bit my marionette lines are softening. It takes less than a dimefour your entire face and neck. So the jar will last a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and the minute I put it on, it seriously took 10 years off my face. Feels very lightweight, but it's definitely working some miracles. Not sure I need an expensive face cream habit, but after using it for a few months there is NO WAY I'm going to give it up!

First off let me address the scent as anything with a scent added may aggravate some people. This is not a perfume-type scent but has more of a lightly sweetened food-type scent (some describe it as a vanilla custard scent).I do not find it to be strong and the scent dissipated practically on contact. I do not like perfumed facial products so I am perfectly okay with the scent and find it pleasant. If in doubt, try to smell it in the store before purchasing.  I have very oily skin and use this mainly at night. It works very well as a moisturizer and is just what I need to keep my skin well-hydrated from the outside. It is not greasy or thick but substantial enough and smooths easily onto the skin. Sometimes I use a bit for daytime but since it does not have spf, I have to make sure to add something that does.  It is in a jar and there is always a concern about bacteria and product longevity. I can't comment as I have not done studies on this or read any pertaining to this particular product. I would prefer it to be in a bottle with a pump because that would definitely help with these two concerns.  This cream feels so nice on the face and absorbs easily. I do not like the price but was able to get it at a discount so that helped. I do use the Genius eye cream as well and look forward to trying out more Algenist products in the future.

Ended up having very flaky skin because of this cream. I used it in the evening only but still had flakey skin. The fragrance is very strong and I disliked it. It does dissipate after you put on the cream but this was definitely disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although I am over 45, my skin is still oily/combination. I was convinced I needed to use only oil-free moisturizers. I decided to try this based on the enthusiasm of the girl helping me at Sephora. I did not expect to love this product at all and I was on the fence at first. But it is very light, totally non-greasy with a light and pleasant fragrance. I highly recommend to others who are dealing with combination or oily skin at age 45+. No product works miracles but so far this makes my skin look and feel better.  I

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have waisted so much money on expensive moisturizers and was concerned this would not help me, boy was I wrong! My skin is never dry anymore with this. I also add the Algenist oil on top and that works great! I would never go without this ever again. The smell is also amazing.

I have been using this for over 2 months now religiously morning and night. It took a while to notice any difference in my skin but it just suddenly happened. My skin is very moisturized and seems thicker and overall healthier. I actually hoped i wouldn't love it so maybe I wouldn't feel bad to return it because I cringed at the register! But I can't do without it now! It will last a while too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this in the store and it was just what my dry flaky skin needed. It's very moisturizing w/out being too heavy. It is expensive, but actually less expensive than what I had been using, and this one is more effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this that lasted about 2-3 nights. The cream is lovely, a bit more of a face-oil texture than the other Algenist cream I tried, but still absorbs well and doesn't cause breakouts. The only thing that holds me back is the price.

I purchased this in store about six weeks ago due to a consultant who raved about the product. I have very dry skin, and the cream moisturizes me very well...for about two hours, then I am back to flaking. The only thing I am pleased with is the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got good results from a 3 day sample from the store - bought it. It feels great on my skin and it looks and feel better and I loves the scent.

reviews.review_title: You are more beautiful every time I see you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I went to Sephora to find a comparable product to Orogold's 24K creme. The consultant in the store asked me what my skin care goal was, so I responded that I wanted a product that absorbed into the deep layers of my skin, with no parabens or artificial sunscreens. She showed me this product. At first I was hesitant to make the jump to such an expensive cream without knowing it's efficacy.  I have never been disappointed. I am glowing, healthy, radiant and even toned. Not to mention excited to wash my face every day knowing that I am putting a product on my skin that is actually making it better.  My demographics: 27 year old, Italian female. Skin type- dry like a desert storm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fine & light texture. It is not a heavy cream but takes care of my drier skin condition for the cold weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for now for over 4 months and I'm just now finishing up my first jar. My husband also likes to sneak a use from time to time. This is like a mousse. It goes on clean. I use this with the Algenist oil, serum, moisturizer, anti-aging facial cleaner, micropolish and peel, and the multi-perfecting detoxifying exfoliator. I use my Clarasonic when cleaning or polishing or the Opal when applying eye serum. I'm 43 and I don't look a day over 35, if that. No one ever believes me when I tell them my age. The Algenist line is the most amazing line of products I've ever used and I'm a product junkie. But I'll not switch from using these. I'm truly blown away by the transformation of my skin in 3 weeks from the use of the full line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Algenist Eye renewal balm so I thought Id try this one too. I like it. The only drawback is the consistency of the product. It's kind of gelatinous. But I've been using it as my night eye cream. What I love about their eye creams is they don't burn my eyes like many others do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was lured in and hooked after the 10-day sample last Summer (side note: very generous on Algenist's behalf; I can see that they got great ROI based on all of the reviews here).  The trial actually CLEARED UP breakouts which I realized were being caused by the Origins moisturizer I was using (in the past I'd typically get 1 zit every 2-3 months). Really like magic, and others noticed too which made it even more compelling.  I purchased the full size immediately. It was a really great moisturizer for summertime since it's not oily. I am hoping that it holds up enough in that sense as the weather is getting colder and dryer.  I am only 26 and out of the sun these days, so I don't have much aging beyond fine lines, although I have noticed a decrease in the 11 lines I had just begun to notice between my eyes. Also have noticed an overall increase in firmness/plumpness along with a noticable decrease in wrinkles in the areas which (for my face) I feel are more wrinkle-prone: smile lines around the mouth & line going across the middle of my neck (please don't forget about your neck, ladies).  I'd go so far as to say this goes a step beyond making your skin look good until you take it off. I really do feel I could attribute this to a more permanent improvement than most moisturizers are able to offer.  One lingering question that piqued my curiosity (which I had read in a beauty blog) is regarding the packaging for this product. It was brought up that these types of moisturizers containing these types of ingredients should be packaged in more air-tight containers, and if not then they lose some of their benefit from the oxygen getting into them. I would be curious to know if there is anything to be said about this, or why this may or not matter for this product.  All of that being said, I am definitely a believer in this product. It has cleared up my skin, diminished fine lines, and enhanced my skin tone + texture.. It doesn't smell bad either, and is long-lasting.

My skin needs moisture, as I am almost 30. However, half the creams I try give me acne on my chin. I sometimes get stuck avoiding moisturizing that area because all creams give me acne there. This is the only cream that I can apply to my chin area and it doesn't give me acne there. There are a lot of good moisturizers on the market, but if you do tend to get acne from certain areas from moisturizers, it makes it hard to use them. I don't know how this will work for other people, but this moisturizer is the only one I can use right now because it doesn't give me chin acne.  Apart from that, it is the best moisturizer I've ever used. A little bit goes a very long way. 5 stars. Only wish the container had a little more in it. Just use it sparingly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Genius since it came out. My friends have noticed the difference in the texture of my skin. This moisturizer is highly emollient...not for oily skin. I am a combination and it works for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried different kind of Algenist moisturizer and I love them although they are a little bit dry for winter. Genius cream is different. This moisturizer is thicker, thus it gives me breakout. Instead of applying every morning and night, I tried to reduce it to every other day at night, but it still gives me breakout (I have combination skin). I will not repurchase this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the sample of this cream and I must say that I am very impressed with it. I only use it once a day and not even every day and I have noticed my face is bright, my neck area is more toned and best of all my chest is smooth and soft ( my skin was very bumpy in this area). I plan to purchase the full size once I am finished with my samples.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With 3 weeks of use now, I have not seen any improvement in my skin - it isn't worse but it isn't any better than before. The cream itself smells good and applies very smoothly on the face and it doesn't give me a mask or a sticky feeling which is nice. I probably won't be repurchasing because it does nothing extraordinary that a regular $40 face cream can't.
My skin is very smooth after using almost my first jar, the eye cream is wonderful too! I get complements on my skin makeup or not all the time since using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge fan of the whole Algenist line. I love this product as well, but I'm a little underwhelmed so far.  It IS moisturizing and the mouse absorbs nicely. It also smells wonderful - like sugar cookies! But it really hasn't changed my skin much. I'm not through a whole bottle quite yet, so I'm still hoping for a more drastic result by the end.
Wow wow wow. My holy grail moisturizer! Absorbs very well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first review. I love this cream so much that I had to speak out! Though I felt satisfied with my previous night time system, I was getting a noticeable forehead wrinkle. Since I was using a really good (and expensive) system, I thought that it was all part of aging. Well, one night I ran out of my night cream (ha, I don't even remember what it was though I used it for years) but I just so happened to have had a forgotten pack of the 10-day sample of the Algenist Genius cream. Since I have lupus and need a moisturizer with strong UV protection, I only used it at night...and still within 10 days, my forehead wrinkle faded. By 20 days (I used half a pack a day), it was gone. I would say a good 90% of the day is spent with my face scrunched up in either pain, concentration, or just plain weird facial expressions (what can I say, everything shows on my face). The fact that it can smooth out the wrinkle despite my best efforts to put it there was amazing in itself but the smell is also delightful. I could honestly swear that it smells like carrot cake with cream cheese icing! To me that's a bonus because I love the smell and it makes me feel like I had dessert even when I haven't. At first I thought the price was too expensive but when I used another night cream after it, it just smelled artificial and felt wrong for my face. I only held out for a little over a week then I had a piece of carrot cake and I caved! I'm so glad I did! Now I can skip the dessert that goes to my hips and use the one that gets rid of wrinkles!

reviews.review_title: Great moisturizer but not impressed for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 27 with minimal skin issues besides some fresh signs of aging and have used this for about 3 months now and i'm almost finished with the full sized jar. What this DID DO for my skin: plumped skin and kept fine forehead and eye lines looking less noticeable; made vast improvements to dry patches on nose and forehead; went on light but after a few hours could get a bit greasy; did not cause any breakouts. What is DID NOT do: no real improvement to a few light sun spots or dark spots on jawline or forehead; no improvement on a few lightly broken capillaries (light redness on cheeks); no noticeable long term anti aging results. As a moisturizer, this was excellent and its plumping is nice for any dull skin or small fine lines. I really don't see any dramatic results to my existing aging issues but I can see how this cream can help prevent over-drying and new line formation. Oily skin may not like how greasy this can become a few hours in, I recommend this more as a night cream for them. For the price factor, I had better results with Elizabeth Arden Prevage but this was still nice for a fancy moisturizer.

I got a sample and was hesitant to use it. It seemed heavy for my oily skin. One night I decided to try it and liked it. I mix it with a couple of drops of the Algenist Advanced Anti-aging Repairing Oil. My skin looks brighter and is a lot less oily/shiny. I use just a bit, about 1/2 of a pea size morning and night.

I'm now on my second jar of this miracle moisturizer. When I first began using it I didn't love it. Then after a few weeks I noticed how nice my skin was. My skin drinks this in, it's never greasy feeling, my pores are in check and towards the end of the day I don't have that oily sheen on my face. I'm in my mid-forties and don't wear very much make up, and with this moisturizer I don't have anything to cover up anymore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just started trying the 10 day sample and I know it's not for me. I don't like the scent-it smells nutty to me, like peanuts and cashews. Then, after applying, I look in the mirror and my cheeks are bright red, and feel warm. Lastly, it felt heavy and made me feel greasy. Glad I got the sample, and not the full size!

reviews.review_title: A Great Cream just not fot Me...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin responded visibly much better in the ways I was looking for and wanting it to w the Algenist Firming and Lifting Cream than it did w this Genius Cream. I was able to test both for a few weeks/about a month each thanks to a nice sized deluxe sample jar of first the Firming and Lifting Cream and then I used the 10Day Challenge promo code for this. Instead of using up an entire packette each day, I just cut open all 10 packettes and refilled my empty jar which made it last literally weeks longer (I actually still have quite a bit left even after using it for way over 10 days!) In my opinion, this is a very, very good cream. But it just did not do all it promised for me, maybe it will for others, but I was looking for certain results that their Firming and Lifting Cream delivered but after my sample of that ran out and I started using this, I saw my face losing the benefits I'd achieved w the Firming and Lifting Cream. So, I decided to just drop the cash for the regular sized Firming and Lifting instead of continuing w this Genuis Cream. I now use what I have left of this as an extra layer of moisturizer over everything on nights I feel I need more hydration and it will probably be great as the weather turns to Winter.  This cream is formulated and advertised to restore skin resiliency and elasticity, delivering a firmer, tighter, more toned appearance. It strengthens the most fragile skin texture, softens facial contours, visibly minimizes fine lines and deep wrinkles, and unveils skinu2019s youthful radiance. I did not notice any tightening, firming or toning, sculpting, etc. that I'm looking for. I feel this cream is more rich feeling, less gel/souffle texture and feels heavier on the skin but it is not too heavy or greasy and seems to be absorbed well. I think this cream makes your face feel hydrated more and for a longer period of Time than the Firming and Lifting. I saw some small amount of wrinkle reduction and feel this cream would be a better choice for those looking for those results as well as to strengthen and restore skin resiliency and elasticity, as well as longer lasting hydration and possibly w continued use that youthful bounce restored to skin and maybe even it will unveil skinu2019s youthful radiance by keeping it hydrated very well as to make skin appear dewy. This IS a really nice cream to use, goes on well- rich but not too overly rich... it's sort of like a whipped but still rich texture, if that makes any sense, it does have a scent but I really do not smell all o this sweetness or vanilla others report, to me it smelled like a mature powder scent and I'd rather no scent to my face creams (like the Algenist Firming and Lifting Cream.) In the end, it did not do everything it promised, specifically the firming, tightening, sculpting, and toning parts so I decided to go with the other product. But, I AM thankful that Sephora gave a decent amount of sample product to actually be able to see if the product will reallydo as it claims. Also, NO breakouts! When searching for a great face cream, it causing my skin to breakout is my WORST FEAR!! BUT, I have sampled many Algenist products since they became available through Sephora and not one has caused me sensitivity or acne breakouts on my nonsensical combination skin that gets VERY oily and shiny in the oily zones. I'm going to use my leftover Genius as a final top layer on nights I still feel I need more hydration.

This moisturizer does nothing to warrant the expensive price tag, although you do get a lot of product. I had been using samples until the VIB Rouge event with 10x reward points. I bought it because it smells heavenly and feels wonderful on my skin; but in terms of actual skin benefits, I've seen none and it's been several months.
The only cream that I have ever known that the moisture was totally locked in all day. It's beyond amazing and leaves ur skin super hydrating and plump! I love it
AMAZING PRODUCT THAT IS NATURAL!! IF YOU WANT AN ANTI AGING PRODUCT FOR MORNING AND AS WELL NIGHT!! For face
This cream is amazing... I love the texture, smell and what it does to my skin. Thank you Algenist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've only been using about three weeks, it makes skin feel smooth, however have not really seen any major changes with lines in face yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I literally have never written a review before but after receiving the 10 day sample I was pretty convinced this stuff is amazing. It took me a while to be convinced of the hefty price tag but I eventually caved and just got the big girl size.  I have 27 year old acne prone skin with unfortunately large pores. As a result my skin tone is not great but this stuff truly works wonders. I live in a dry, mountain climate and this product is outstanding for providing lasting moisture even through Benzyl-peroxide treatment and arid high altitude days. I also spend a lot of time outdoors and it really helps rejuvenate my sometimes weathered feeling skin.  I can't speak much to it's anti-wrinkle effects but in terms of the waking-up-with-a-glow effect, it's worth the money. Also smells nice!  Bottom line: It lives up to it's product description.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the 10 day sample. It is lightweight, absorbs quickly, but it does not do anything to my skin. I dont like the smell either. I will not buy the full size, which is pricey for what it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the bouncy texture and the way it sinks into my skin quickly without leaving a greasy aftermath. The scent is nice as well, a slightly sweet vanilla, not at all over-powering and actually encouraged me to use it faithfully at night. The big BUT for me is that I simply have not seen any improvement in my skin. At 36 I have suddenly developed some weird skin issues, like redness and non-acne bumps. I fortunately don't have any visible fine lines yet, so I was really hoping this could just help with a gentle overturning of skin cells to renew the baby fresh skin we all want. Everyone's skin is different though, and no one will have the same response to anything we apply to our skin. For me, it just did not correct the issues I was looking to fix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with the sweet vanilla scent, and the gel-like texture doesn't bother me, but I'm not a big fan of it either. This didn't seem to clog my pores and I really wanted to love this, but I find it just doesn't provide enough moisture for my relatively dry yet acne-prone skin. I'll be going back to the Nude Advanced Renewal moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a WONDERFUL product. I have been using another upscale product line which requires day cream, nite cream, lifting cream, etc etc. I came to conclusion that I was really spending a great deal of $. Decided to give Genius cream a try and I am more that pleased with results. Great feeling cream and my old parched dry skin is not feeling so parched anymore; and my facial expression lines are looking a little less! I also think my skin is firmer and has somewhat of a glow. I have 71 yr old skin and this product is the best that I have tried in the last year. Liked it so much that I am trying Algenist serum and going to try the Genius eye cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Algenist Genius Cream, creamy yet gel-like texture. Absorbs wonderfully into skin. Very hydrating, I'll be using this as a night cream, too much for my skin to layer under foundation. Only thing I don't like about Algenist Genius Cream is the strong lingering fragrance. Too bad it's not fragrance-free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took the ten day sampler of this cream and was so impressed by the difference it made in my skin that I sucked it up and paid the price for the cream. Super expensive and not sure if I'll do it again, but must say that every am my skin glows, seems tighter and my wrinkles have disappeared. If you have the $ go for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad I chose the 10 sample pack of this cream when I placed an order online. I didn't have any expectations, I just thought I'd give it a try. Turns out this creme is amazing. I'm 43 and I've been noticing my age in the skin on my neck...wrinkles forming, skin sagging slightly...this creme has made a noticeable difference in how my neck looks...firmer, smoother. Because if this, I have just invested in an Algenist cleanser, toner, exfoliant and the Genius creme! I've used the cleanser, toner and exfoliant just once so far and my skin feels so soft and smooth. Would highly recommend Algenist products.
Didn't see any visible difference made with the wrinkles, but it hydrates the skin well and good texture. Too overpriced though judging by its results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the ten day sample and was amazed at how quickly it worked! I could see visible results! The smell is lovely and coconutty! It is silky and smooth. It is a bit expensive, but I think totally worth it!
I tried the 10 day sample and fell in love! It's help heal some of my acne scars. I do think the price is a bit steep, that's why I gave it only 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Genius cream with a 10 day sample from Sephora and was hooked from Day One! It smells fresh and has a nice consistency. It feels very moisturizing but without feeling heavy. I've used many moisturizers, at many price points but this is the first I feel is worth every penny!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so cool! I just use the smallest amount by dragging my two fingers over the top and then applying to my skin. You do not need a lot to get the nourishment! I am only using this in the evening since it may be too much during this very humid weather time of the year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My previously favorite cream was out of stock for a long time, forcing me to try something new. So glad that happened otherwise i may never have found salve it's Genius cream.  Yes, it's costly but I think it's great value. I need only a small amount even though I easily feel tight skin after washing with great gentle cleanser. I think the full size lasts me almost 2 or 3 months. It has a light smell that reminds me of vanilla-I usually hate fragrances in my products but this one works for me.  And the cream itself has made a noticeable difference to my skin. More glowing, smaller pores, less noticeable fine lines, and tighter in general. Love this product. I would like a travel size option as the packaging is heavy. I know I could put some in a smaller container myself but that requires planning... :)  I've now switched to the algenist cleanser which I also like, and just added the eye cream-both great additions to my skincare regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This face cream is AMAZING. I read the glowing reviews so I thought I would give it a try, and boy am I thankful that I did. I am 36, so I don't have a ton of wrinkles, but my laugh lines are there and these two lines in between my eyes....not sure what they are called. I can see the results. I am on day 6, and already I feel like they are diminishing. I call it my magic eraser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its only 2 weeks I have been using it, and it looks good so far. I give it 3 stars because it feels very nice on my skin and is absorbs quickly

I have tried just about every brand and every cream on the market from Lancu00f4me to La Mer. This Genius is...GENIUS.
