My skin has never looked better...even toned...almost like I have foundation on BUT I DON'T!!! Worth every penny...and I also love the smell...like a light, delicious vanilla. I actually look forward to washing my face even when I'm dead tired after a 12 hour day!! BUY IT!!

reviews.review_title: Great but fragrance needs to be removed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The cream hydrates very well and is the best one out of all the Algenist ones I have tried so far. I use it every night and it made my skin supple and soft. Also, the wrinkles between eyebrows are not as noticeable as before.  Not only that I am not a fan of the smell, but I think fragrance should be an ingredient when it comes to skin care products.

This product is seriously amazing. I received the 10 day sample and I noticed after about a week how much brighter, clearer and smoother my skin was. It has definitely smoothed the lines on my forehead and made my pores seem less noticeable. It is pretty expensive, but my skin looks and feels better than ever! Love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Algenist Genius cream is amazing. I took the 10-day challenge and saw a difference in about five days. It's been two months since I purchased the 2 oz. jar and my skin looks amazing. The texture and tone are drastically improved, my skin looks firmer, and wrinkles have been minimized. But what I really appreciate is the youthful glow that's once again apparent in my complexion! Genius smells nice too; not too heavily perfumed and it's non-greasy. And did I mention a little goes a long way?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried the 10 day trial and it made my skin very soft, and I liked the scent-- kinda vanilla custardy with a bit of spice-- like rice pudding. I purchased the full size and have been using for 1 month. The jar is somewhat small, but heavy glass so it makes it seem as there is a lot of product in it .The product inside has a cream -gel consistency I do not yet notice an increase in skin firmness, but the scent is strangely addictive. That doesn't justify the super high price tag to me. It is non irritating, but when I read claims of patented anti aging breakthrough, I have high expectations. I don't think I have seen the results claimed yet. FYI: when I see the word luxurious in descriptions-- to me, it means indulgent and overpriced!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried two of the 10 day sample packs of Algenist, and at first I did think this cream was genius.. I loved the fresh smell and it felt good while applying. However, after scrutinizing my skin during and after the 20 days I saw no real difference. I am 38 with no major wrinkles, just some creases by my eyes when I smile and a small one on my forehead so that could be it. BUT you would think I would see some type of difference with a genius cream that costs $110. After this trial period, I returned to my Clinique moisture surge night mask and Tarte eye cream... my face felt and looked much better and had more of a healthy glow. I just cannot justify the price of this product, considering that my Clinique works even better for me/ lasts longer, and is $32.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and typically like moisturizers that are lightweight but this one is life changing. It has a great gel like texture that absorbs really quick and leaves the skin feeling nourished. I skipped it for a couple of days and I definitely felt it. Must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received a 10 FREE sample with my last purchase of Dr.Perricone sample box. Dr. Perricone products have nothing on this. Its day 5 and I see a decrease in crows feet and smile lines. I love the smell. I'm investing!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and used for 10 days and ended up ordering because I felt my skin looked much clearer and brighter after using, and I liked the scent and the non-greasy lightness of the product. I have used many Algenist products and have never been disappointed, though they are pricey.

reviews.review_title: My go to cream year round
reviews.review_text: I purchased this cream and the oil free cream for summer. Much to my surprise I have used this as my year round daily facial moisturizer. I prefer this over the gel oil free product. I have repurchased this product, this is one of the few creams I have ever finished. I works well for combination skin, it isn't very greasy.

It is hard to put into words how great this cream is. I have never had such a glowing skin after only 2 days of use. I received this cream as a 10 day sample, and will be ordering the large size. It is pricey, but I do believe the price is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Facts: I'm in my 40's but my age is guessed to be in my 30's. I have fair, senstitive skin, with an oily t-zone. I have some redness and mild dark spots. My biggest fear is a product that clogs pores, causes breakouts, or burns. This product exceeds my expectations and is delightful to use & wear. It has hydrated my dry areas without leaving a greasy or heavy feel. It has cleared and soothed my redness and overall brightened my skin tone in a very short period of time (days/weeks) not months! It's rich, luxurious, thick yet lightweight and absorbs fast. It smells great and truly seeps into fine lines to help minimize them. I'm a result based person with some budget limitations but when I come across a product THIS good, I believe we get what we pay for. I'd like to see the product come in a tube or pump so that bacteria from fingers doesn't transfer into and contaminate the whole jar - that's my only criticism. I highly recommend it and hope all who read this review find it helpful toward finding a cream you enjoy. :)

reviews.review_title: It says what it is right there on the label...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: ...genius. Well, don't know about genius, but pretty darn good. I'm more than 1/2 way through my second jar of this stuff and I know that I'll be springing for the 3rd. I'm using it both in the AM/PM and my skin is firm, fresh, moisturized and hydrated. I no longer get weird dry patches. It plays nicely with my Retin A. What else can I say? It ticks all the boxes.  It doesn't have a definite sweet scent, a bit like soft serve ice cream (ever since I read that somewhere, I can't get it out of my mind - it pretty much hits the nail on the head). It is not cloying - I definitely don't go for sweet or vanilla scents but do not find this one disturbing. It's consistency is a creamy gel. It spreads easily and absorbs quickly, never leaving a feeling of something sitting on the skin. Just velvety softness.  I have also found that it works quite well under primer and/or makeup.  The only thing that could improve it for me? Bigger jars - I seem to be flying through this cream faster than other ones although the content is the same. Probably as I use it 2x a day instead of one. And the price. But - to me - it is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the facial creme

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never written a review, but this product's effects were fantastic! I did the free trial while on a (stressful) trip. My skin was radiant after the first week - more toned and firm. Plus, it smells like vanilla and roasted almonds. At 50, I've used everything from the most expensive products to the drugstore brands and have never seen this wonderful of a result so quickly! Definatly an advance in the field.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the 10 day free sample pack, and I noticed the difference after day 4. I would recommend this for sure. Just a bit expensive. But well worth the results. Thanks for the sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Algenist Genius comes in a 2 ounce (60ml) jar. It is an odd consistency in the jar: as if it has a bit of gelatin thickener but acts like any other cream on the skin. It is easy to apply and has a very nice scent - light and fresh. It does not absorb really quickly. I do use it twice a day, morning and evening. I don't generally use foundation per se so I don't worry so much about the rate. By the time I am getting dressed it is absorbed. I have not used this long enough to determine whether or not it will live up to its claims. However, I can feel the softness of my skin for the entire time between uses and that is a first for my dry skin. I also think the age caused wrinkling I sometimes get in the cleavage area is less apparent due to increased moisturizing. Still, it been only 2 weeks so, I'll see. Now as to price. The 3 figure price for 2 oz. is a LOT, for those of us who are frugal. After all, one is instructed, for best results (does anyone want less?), to use twice a day on face, neck and chest. So, it may well be that we are looking at need to purchase at least monthly. I sure hope the results will, in the long run, justify the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 23 and drink like a Russian stuck in a remote cabin during the depths of winter. A couple of months ago I was approached by a man at the bar who asked how old I was. I told him to guess. He responded with 30. I told him my correct age to which he replied, wow, you must party a lot. So I decided to invest in an anti-aging cream. I was able to sample the Genius Cream and was immediately hooked. My fine lines are gone, redness; also gone. It has a light vanilla scent (don't worry, you won't smell like a stripper) and a little goes a long way. After using this product for a couple months my skin feels refreshed, hydrated, and I haven't had a problem getting laid.

I tried the 10 day sample and really loved this cream. I like the smell. The texture is gorgeous and doesn't feel greasy even in the heat but was very hydrating. I also have very redness prone skin and it neutralizes the redness. I didn't see dark spot reduction but I don't think 10 days is likely enough. I will probably buy it next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the 10-day sample and I will purchase this product because it is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A Sephora salesperson recommended this because I was looking for a night cream that would help improve the texture of my skin. I have to admit that up until this year (I'm 40) I haven't exactly taken good care of my skin. With that said, in the past year I've started to really have issues with my skin. I have trouble with redness, uneven texture, bi-polar combination skin (extreme dryness AND oiliness), and wrinkles. In the past year, I've tried so many moisturizers and serums and haven't really been impressed with anything until now. The first night I used it I woke up to noticeably smoother skin. After the first week the texture, redness and dryness was dramatically improved! I've even noticed softening of the lines around my eyes and forehead. I'm not exactly sure why a lot of people are complaining about the scent- it's a very light vanilla scent which I actually find soothing. The texture is almost like a whipped cream-gel and it goes on so smooth. I wear mineral makeup and now I literally wear half the makeup I used to because my skin is so much clearer. Someone commented the other day that I'm really lucky because I have such great skin. It is pricey, but it's a huge jar and will last a long time. It's worth every penny! You won't be disappointed.

I tried the 10 day sample that Sephora offered. I wasn't overly excited about the product because honestly, they all claim that they do so much, but end up costing much more than they do. Anyway, I put it on every nightu2026By day 3 something happened! I woke up and my face looked smooth, even and wrinkles seemed softer. I didn't get excited, but I was definitely getting lured. Needless to say, by day 10, I was at my local Sephora buying this stuff. My skin has never EVER looked as good as it does now. I look awesome with no makeup. Ive never been able to say that prior to using this product. My fine lines under my eyes are softer than they've ever been. In fact, they've almost disappeared. I should note that I love the texture of this. In the jar it almost feels like flan..LOL..It's very thick, so a little goes a long way. I apply it heavier at night, but today I tried it under my makeup to see if I can also ear it during the day, and it held up quite well. (I have oily skin) So I guess I'll be using this day and night. I'd give it a shot. I think you'll like it =)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's firming and lifting. And moisturizing. Nice feel, no scent. Love love love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this cream Although since it is so expensive I'm very stingy with it. Makes a big difference in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You don't need t use much and my skin retains the moisture all day long (at night as well. Those lines disappear.

Ok, I think it smells great, but I'm sure it's not for everyone. I did the 10 day challenge since I have minor wrinkles under my eyes. It didn't make them go away, it just reduced their depth a smidgen. but overall, my skin is much clearer, brighter, and my severe redness (not rosacea) is clearing up. If it weren't so darn expensive, I'd absolutely buy a jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely think this cream does wayyyy more than I need. I might not see the firming/tighening yet, but I love the feel of this cream. It is whipped, so I use a scoop to take a small amount, although there is oil in it, it is completely absorbed.  I can't believe the 'smell' is such a divisive factor for the reviewers, because it's lightly sweet and barely noticeable.  absorbs quickly(54) lightweight(47) intensive(29) moisturizing(2) nourishing(2) a rosacea trigger(1) amazing smell(1) brightening(1) expensive(1) expensive!(1) fragrance(1) fragrant(1) good for sensitive skin(1) good moisturization(1) gross(1)  absorbs quickly(54) lightweight(47) intensive(29) moisturizing(2) nourishing(2) a rosacea trigger(1) amazing smell(1) brightening(1) expensive(1) expensive!(1) fragrance(1) fragrant(1) good for sensitive skin(1) good moisturization(1) gross(1)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the 10 day sample and did not think much about it. 4 days in my husband commented on how nice my skin looked. By the 7th day, it had my skin totally clear. I had been getting small red bumps around the crown of my forehead, not a trace left, no bumps, nothing! Just smooth skin! I would never dream of paying this price for a skin treatment, but it hooked me. It is a big jar, so I hope it lasts.

reviews.review_title: so NOT formulated for oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the 10 day challenge and was not at all impressed!!! I have oily skin and I felt greasy as soon as I put it on. I saw NO difference whatsoever after 10 days. I must add that I don't understand the other reviews about the bad or overwhelming smell of the product, it HARDLY smells at all and certainly doesn't last long. Save your money ladies and don't purchase the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream does what it says. It glides on smooth, hydrates your skin all while working on anti-aging. I have seen a noticeable improvement in the appearance of my skin's texture. I highly recommend this skin cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I also tried the 10 day challenge and I'm hooked. I wake up each morning with baby smooth skin. I don't have deep wrinkles so I can't testify if it removes deep wrinkles, but I found that it is great with fine lines, and it made the little acne bumps on my skin disappear! So happy with it and have told all my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: got this as a sample. I definitely see a difference. My skin use to be blah. Now I don't feel self conscious going with out foundation. Face is brighter, more even. and feels balanced. It's pricey, very pricey. But I can't go back to blah.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After I tried out this cream as a sample, I liked how it softened and brightened up my skin. Also, I like the fact that I can apply this cream on my neck. I have very sensitive skin on my neck, so all other (even neck creams) creams made my neck itchy after application. The smell is very good and the texture is like whipped cream or soft tofu. I gave 4 stars due to the high price. The price is too high for me but I took an advantage of Sephora coupon and got 15% off. I think I will buy it again but preferably with a discount offer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried every moisturizer out there. I have sensitive skin that can be dry, is frequently red or splotchy and has oily spots. I tried the 10 day challenge, and this moisturizer is amazing. After about 7 days my skin was glowing. Clear, smooth, no redness, no dry or oily patches - just beautiful, clear skin. I sampled it during a time of month I typically break out, and I was shocked that I didn't have even one blemish. Not one. It is pricey, but I purchased it immediately. Clear skin is worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great winter cream/night cream for combination skin. It does have a somewhat strong smell though (sort of like cookies), so I would advise anyone who is against a strong fragrance smell, to keep that in mind when purchasing.

reviews.review_title: Can we talk about how this smells
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: yummy just yummy. it's a light burnt vanilla smell. it's a wonderful addition to the serum, instead of the moisturizer I guess and with a random primer and a little foundation, i'm done for hours and hours. oh and i usually loathe anything scented except citrus but this is exceptional.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as the 10-day sample and this is pretty good. I was looking for an anti-aging product so the samples were perfect timing. I don't have fine lines or wrinkles yet, so I was using this more for preventing them than treating them. I did notice my skin was brighter and more awake looking. I have a couple issues with this tho it works pretty well. My skin is combo but on the drier side so this wasn't thick enough to totally moisturize, it sort of evened out my skin tone, made me break out, and this smells a little weird like way too planty. Because I did break out and wasn't really moisturized, I think I'll have to keep searching.

reviews.review_title: Feels great, but I am breaking out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The good news: feels amazing, light scent. The not so great news: I'm breaking out big time and I believe this is the culprit. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Since I've been using this, people have been commenting on my skin more than ever. I am on my second jar and plan to keep on using it. I use it on my neck/chest as well and a friend commented that I have the neck and chest of a 25 year old. Ha. That made my day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. I have been using it for two months. The fine lines around my eyyes and mouth are gone. My skin looks firmer. A friend asked me if I had somethig done because my skin looked so good. The cream is very soothing and has a wonderful smell.This is a must have for me. I have never had a product that has delivered results like I have experienced with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I already see lines diminishing in my forehead that were more like creases. The cream is expensive but still cheaper and healthier than botox. The texture of my skin has been softer, smoother, and deweyer since the first use.

I've been using this for around a week now. The first few days of use seemed to cause a few really itchy breakouts on my forehead and neck. But I kept using it to give it a proper chance and I'm definitely glad I did because it has done amazing things for my face and neck! My skin is so smooth, soft and glowing now. Absolutely love this! (Sidenote: I also use Clinique's acne system so that might've helped clear the breakouts up faster than if I didn't use it.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received the 10 day trial and I loved it. Goes on light and makes my skin look amazingly smooth. I have oily 51 yr old skin and it helps minimize the look of pores and did not cause any breakouts or blackheads. Bought the full size right away. A little goes a long long way. I only needed half the sample for my face and neck and decollete. Bought the cleanser and eye balm since I loved the genius cream so much. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gel cream is a fantastic texture. It's lightweight, absorbs quickly, but leaves my finnick-y combination skin hydrated and smooth. I am also in love with the scent, a light clean smell that I can't quite place. It seems pricey, but a little goes a very long way. If it's in the budget, definitely give it a try. Very rich in anti-aging ingredients, and a great add-on to a retinol-containing routine.

I have had to stay away from most antiaging creams because my skin is very prone to cystic acne, but I tried the 10 day sample of this and loved it. It didn't make me break out and I really did notice a difference in the texture and appearance of my skin. My skin was much more supple, hydrated, and plumped-up.

I received the 10 day trial and I'm still in disbelief it actually worked. I applied as directed and focused on a wrinkle in between my brows. The wrinkle has softened and my skin is more even toned! This is the real deal. Definitely getting this because I can only imagine the beautiful results if I continue to use.

reviews.review_title: Never got a chance to see the 10 day effect
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got the 10 day challenge and tried it twice one week apart. Both times I broke out in itchy bumps and acne. Disappointed I didn't get to take the challenge and see its stuff. I don't know why I had this reaction, since the Algenist Oil seemed well tolerated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream glides on smoothly and disappears immediately. It has no strong smell which competes with my cologne or body spray. Best of all, my sensitive skin does not break out. As for fine lines, the wrinkles are still there but it doesn't glare angrily like before.

I got the sample and was immediately hooked! What a difference it made on my face in such a short amount of time! I settled for a less expensive brand but inevitably had to go back to this as nothing measured up! A must have!

I think I like this cream. It feels amazing, my skin feels soft and I think my fine lines and wrinkles are looking smoother. The smell doesn't really bother me ... I don't understand why skin care has to have fragrance, but that's a whole other issue... I've been using it in the morning and I can feel like the dead skin peeling off my face ... I think if I switch to using it at night I will like it a whole lot better. Overall I've been using it about two weeks .. I love the way it feels, we shall see over time what kind of results I get ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did the 10 day sample packets from Sephora. My expectations were not high but I used this cream nightly for 10 days. All I can say is WOW! It really does deliver with consistent use. I highly recommend this cream. NOW THE BAD.......the price! I REALLY wish Algenist would make this in the next size smaller (1 oz?) and charge half the price so this product could be more attainable for consumers. Over $100 is a lot for most people to spend, in one hit, on a face cream. ALGENIST: PLEASE MAKE A DIFFERENT SIZE WITH A MORE MANAGEABLE PRICE POINT FOR CUSTOMERS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started with the Algenist 10 day challenge samples but after only 2 days I bought the full size jar. I love this creme! I'm already an Algenist Firming and Lifting serum user (which I also love) and adding the cream to my daily routine made my skin look even better. I've never used a cream before that provided this much improvement of fine lines in such a short time. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cream....it absorbs quickly...is light and non greasy...smells great...and makes my skin glow!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a LaMer/Revive user for years. I took the 10 day and was hooked. I did see results, subtle, but results nevertheless. I personally love the smell. The jar you get is very big and the product is thicker in the jar than in the sample package. So even though 110 may seem a little steep, you really use so little with each application

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I chose the sample of this cream, then bought the whole jar.. Unbelievable... the wrinkles on my forehead are almost gone, my skin has really changed that I don't have to wear much foundation. Worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I applaud the marketing strategy of the 10 day sample. I am on day 4 and I have noticed that the large pores on my nose are shrinking. Nothing has ever helped that area and I didn't expect this would. Also, my face is more firm. I didn't know how to use this so I have used it as a night cream. It's way too much to use under makeup and I didn't want to open a packet and use it twice. It has a refreshing cooling effect on the skin immediately. The jury is still out though. I will re-post when done with 10 days. For me to buy, because it is pricey, it would have to remove a dark spot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this based on good reviews, but overall, the product has been very disappointing. While it is a nice moisturizer and the jar has lasted me a long while, I see NO overall changes in my skin appearance. I purchased mainly to combat aging and sunspots, and I can't see that it's helped either issue. I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Some of the serums and creams I've tried work great for the first few days then my skin rebounds. On the 10th day of the challenge and effects and results are holding up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had read reviews about people not liking the smell of this and I thought they were crazy because in the store I loved the smell...sort of a creme brulee. I thought, what's not to like? Well, when you put it on your face, you are inundated with this plasticlike vanilla scent and it doesn't dissipate. I had to wash it off and return it so I can't tell if it had any skin benefits.  Also if you have acne prone skin, I'd steer clear, as algae is rated 5/5 on the comedogenicity scale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered a few samples with purchases to try this. I have tried MANY MANY other moisturizes on my fair, sensitive skin. As soon as I go through my samples I WILL purchase this moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took the Sephora challenge and did experience transformational anti-aging results in one day! I have tried many products but Algenist delivered on their promises. I love this product and I have seen beautiful results in my skin with firmness and hydration.
I was looking for a great moisturizer this winter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Algenist anti-aging moisturizer for about a year now but decided to try their new Genius moisturizer because of the great reviews. I saw immediate results I kid you not. This cream is amazing and makes my skin look youthful and dewy. The lines around my mouth are almost gone. Lines on my forehead are still there but smoother looking. I also noticed the deep lines on my neck are less noticeable. I'm very happy with this cream and will keep buying it although it's expensive but I used a 10% off coupon I got in email so will buy it only when I get a coupon. But less is better, you don't have to apply a lot on your skin plus I don't need to buy the serum now because it seems to give me the same benefits as the serum so I'm saving money there. .

reviews.review_title: Good - not sure if worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Well, I liked it. I'm not sure I liked it enough to spend $110 on the full-size version, but I did the 10-day sample and I liked the mild vanilla scent (and so did my husband) and the way it moisturized my skin without feeling greasy, and lasted all day. I did notice some mild redness on my cheeks and it didn't do diddly-squat for the hyperpigmentation on my forehead, but I'm 49 and already have found I need prescription strength stuff to lighten that. Genius? Not quite. More like AP Calculus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and I love it! By day 5 my skin is glowing, looks refreshed, supple, and appears more youthful. It goes great under makeup too. Absolutely worth the money. The smell is slight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started the 10 day trial with a CLEAR face. The first day I noticed blackheads and 2 new spots on my nose. Second day, I had more breakouts, so I discontinued use. Also, since many reviewers mentioned the fragrance, I was shocked that I didn't notice vanilla (like so many have mentioned). I detected a STRONG powdery smell. Almost overwhelming.
I have tried many night creams, and this is so far the best. It quickly absorbs and makes my skin very even.

I got a sample of this and I have to say that I am a bit sensitive to smells. This stuff smells really bad. I think I can best describe it as vanilla and burnt coffee grounds. Don't know if it works, can't use it because it really stinks. Have to go wash it off my face now...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know these things take some time to really, really show results, so I reserve the right to update this review :).  I think today made the 5th day I've been using this and already I'm so excited. Day 1-3: I loved the subtle scent and the way my skin felt. I almost couldn't stop touching my face. I started using it on my neck and decollete as well and WOW what a difference!  Day 4-5: Things just keep getting better and better. I noticed a big difference in my neck and chest. Everything is smoother and any lines I had (I didn't really have much problem with saggy neck skin yet), are fading. I noticed a bigger difference in my face as well today. The 11 between my eyes is fading and my crows feet are appearing smoother.  Can't wait to see how this keeps working!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good stuff. In my very early 30's where I'm just beginning to worry about wrinkles and loss of firmness. I used this for just 2 days and can already see a difference. Obviously it won't get rid of wrinkles because that's just not possible, but it definitely reduces the show of them. I am not sure how it would work for deeper set wrinkles or other problems. I have not used any other anti-aging cream to compare. But I do like this and plan to purchase once the samples run out :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is oh so good! I have dry skin and occasional monthly break outs so I am very picky about moisturizers. Genius cream feels so luxurious and light weight on my skin and it does not break me out. I like how it does not have a pungent smell instead it has a light fresh sweet smell. After applying my face feels supple, clean, and moisturized without feeling like I have a thick film of cream on. I do not like the price but I have not found anything that compares to results it gives.

reviews.review_title: Holy cow! This stuff works! But with drawbacks.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this product in my last Sephora order and used it last night for the first time. Here are my impressions in chronological order: 1. I don't like the fragrance of this very much. It is not unpleasant, I just don't like it, others may like it.  2. It irritates my skin. I have mild rosacea and I definitely experienced some reddening and stinging in my cheeks.  3. I woke up this morning and noticed SIGNIFICANT reduction in the lines between my eyebrows and on either side of my mouth. (I don't have many wrinkles, but these two areas are troublesome to me.)  4. I am not sure I can use this product again, given that it triggers my rosacea, but holy cow! it worked! I may try using a spot application on my problem areas and see how that works, because IT WORKS!  5. DANG! This stuff is expensive! Is it worth it? Maybe I can find it at a lower price if I shop around.

i got this as a free mobil offer with a purchase of $25 or more and i loved it im out now so i plan to purchase the big bottle next month cant wait $110 is worth the price the bottle is huge it will last several months

I waited until I finished the entire product before reviewing because of all the good reviews that others have given it. After twice a day use for a few months, I see no visible changes in my skin. No fading of hyper-pigmentation nor softening of fine lines or wrinkles. This cream over-promises and under-delivers...genius? I don't think so!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't opt to buy this cream initially because of the price point but I read a review from someone else who said you can pay $55 or more for 1 oz. of a moisturizer, which is a good point. This is 2 oz. so although the price makes me cringe a bit, I do really like this product. The cream is literally bouncy to touch and cloud/whipped like in the container. Initially I didnt like that vanilla'esque scent but it has grown on me. I find this cream very decadent and feels great on my face. I have nice skin but I'm looking forward to seeing what 10 days(and longer) bring from twice a day use of this product. I've only been using this a short while, thats the reason for not five stars - too soon to tell. But so far so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this product, it does not break me out. It does make your face bouncy and supple but does not fade dark spots. After a while the scent fades in the jar. I wish it came in a tube or pump for the Anti-oxidants to remain stable and to avoid contamination. There are other products that do the same thing plus more for less with better packaging and contain more ingredients like peptides. I feel its over price and will only purchase again if the packaging changes and the price goes down a bit. I think that $85 -$89 is reasonable for this basic luxury cream.
Love this cream! I am only 35 but have wrinkles starting and have used this cream for three months and have go a back for more!

reviews.review_title: Like it but not as good as I hoped
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the Genius cream....I use it twice a day and I can definitely see a visible difference in my fine lines and the overall appearance of my face with regards to LINES. With that said, I do NOT see any fading of my age spots or redness. That is disappointing because that was the primary reason I bought it.  I love the lightweight feeling when I put it on and the scent is pleasant and not overwhelming.  For the price, I will probably refrain from buying when I finish this jar. Again, I bought it to fade the age spots and redness on my face and it did nothing for that AT ALL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this cream as a sample, and I plan on buying the full size. My skin has never felt better. I was worried it would make me breakout, but it actually completely cleared up my skin, not to mention it smells so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are not enough words to describe this cream, it is amazing. I have thin sensative skin and rosacea and this cream can calm redness pulmp up my lines and just all in all make me feel like a million bucks. It should becuase it cost like a million bucks but I continue to buy it I dont mind. the algenist eye balm is to die for also. Get them you wont regret it

I tried the deluxe sample and quite like the whipped cream texture that provides sufficient moisturization and great spreadability. I will not have hesitated to buy the full size has it not contain 'coumarin'.

I am in my early 20's and I am just beginning my anti-aging regiment. I sampled this on a whim when it first came out and now I'm in LOVE! I use this as my night time moisturizer. I love the way this cream smells, but what I love even more the is way it feels on my skin. It's so luxurious and I feel pampered every night when I apply it to my skin! It's just truly AMAZING!

I had been looking for the right product for some time. Not oily, not smelly, and unbelievable results in the 1st week. Someone even commented on how good I was looking about 2 weeks after starting to use, and she had no idea I bad bought anything.. Not cheap but worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this by sampling it bur quickly fell in love! It absorbs like a dream and has caused my skin to look much more plump (lol) ans most importantly, I have not experienced any breakouts!

Gosh, I've been looking for the perfect moisturizer for God knows how long, and ladies and gents, THIS IS IT. It works, makes my skin firmer, luxuriously moisturized without feeling oily, feeling just incredibly radiant and silky! AND, it smells AMAZING! When you think about it, the value honestly is great! Just think - it's $110 for 2 ounces, and many moisturizers are around $50 for 1 ounce, so 1 ounce of the product would be worth $55, so basically you're just getting more at once and you won't have to replenish as often. It's really an average price for an effective product that is totally worth it! MUCH better than Fresh's black tea age delay cream, like ninety bucks for an ounce and it's not half as nice as this. Please bring this Genius cream back in stock!
I truly love the texture and I have oily skin , the first night i used it I woke up with a radiant complexion. And skin felt tight it was amazing. I highly recommend it !!!!

reviews.review_title: One of the BEST I've tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many outstanding moisturizers in my days - many from very prominent spas and I typically stick to spa grade skincare care that is pure, effective and does not contain harsh or unnatural ingredients. So far I have been using this creme every night for a couple of weeks and I love it! I love the scent, the texture is perfect, it glides on easy, absorbs and I find my skin to feel soft and moisturized. I love that it is made local (for me) and even though I was shocked by the price, I think the jar will last me 1/2 year. A little goes a long way...

reviews.review_title: Will use ALGENIST everything from now on!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm the type of person who will buy anything once and try anything and, unfortunately, believe every promise by every company usually to my dismay. Well, I stumbled on Algenist and love everything I've tried. I cannot imagine leaving this brand - face, night, eye --- I've now purchased it all and it all seems fabulous. My skin feels wonderful and soft after application!

I have extremely sensitive skin & I love the way this product pampers & softens my skin. I also enjoy the yummy smell & texture, rich & gel-like. Its a great product & I plan on trying more from Algenist..

I have extremely sensitive skin & I love the way this product pampers & softens my skin. I also enjoy the yummy smell & texture, rich & gel-like. Its a great product & I plan on trying more from Algenist..

I have extremely sensitive skin & I love the way this product pampers & softens my skin. The promises made by this product are not a lie, although some skins would benefit more from this product than others, that can be said of any skin cream. Works great for me!

Hardly any of this product's claims are true, as proven (or lack there of) by research. Don't waste your money.

The quality is pretty good. I agree with other comments. However, I would not say this is the best product out there. I give 4 out of 5 for the quality but the overall rating would be 3 out of 5 because as I said.. this is not the 'amazing' product yet the price seems... expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has the consistency of a lightweight airy souffle and the scent is absolutely divine with delicious warm vanilla notes. It has rapid absorption and leaves no residue behind making it great to wear under your foundation. My skin during the winter is on the slightly dry side so this really was soaked up immediately on my face. The results I experienced was super soft and moisturized skin with a fantastic glow. I think for me that was the best quality, the fact that it made my skin look like glowing porcelain. I don't know how it would work as an anti-aging on more mature skin but I did notice a smoother texture and a slight plumpness to my cheek. This for me works more as a fabulous moisturizer more than an anti-aging cream and I would need to use it over time to see how drastic if any the results could be. My skin is sensitive so it was nice to not have any breakouts or irritations using this product as it was very gentle on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a big Algenist fan, and this cream did not disappoint. It moisturizes beautifully, while not being heavy. I don't wake up in the morning to a grease slick. My skin looks great, and I couldn't be more pleased. Well worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a Algenist user I am still not disappointed. This feels wonderful on my face and neck. While I find this product pricey it is worth it. You see immediate results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say, besides the incredible smell, I have been loving this cream. Not only is it moisture rich, my pores and creases (ok, wrinkles) are much less noticeable. I have been using this for about 2 weeks and very happy so far! I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cream. I am the definition of product junkie and just recently discovered this brand after getting the 10-day trial of their serum. This product, despite a slightly unpleasant smell, is truly amazing. My skin is dry and overly sensitive and this has a nice calming effect and leaves me so-so-so-so soft! My pores seem smaller, my skintone more even, etc etc. I have been using this as my am moisturizer for a couple weeks and couldn't be happier with the results! Well worth the steep price tag in my opinion.  (You also only need a very small amount...a big plus!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had bad luck with the first Algenist product I tried (the anti-aging oil everyone seems to love), but I decided to give them a second try with a deluxe sample of this cream. I am so glad I did! This is the best face cream I have ever used, and I will be purchasing as soon as I finish my sample. I have very sensitive skin, but this product did not give me even a hint of breakout. It glides on smoothly, hydrates beautifully, and is just all-around exactly the kind of product I needed. I am also very sensitive to scented products, and I like the light scent of this one. I usually put it on after a Perricone serum that smells terrible, and the very light vanilla scent to this product is fantastic, especially in comparison. :) I have been using this cream morning and night every day, and it is making my skin look great! Highly recommend this wonderful cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I take very good care of my skin, so I am not easily impressed.  This cream really makes a difference. I use the Algenist serum and am very pleased with my results with that, so it's almost incredible that the cream took my skin up a notch.  After 10 days, my skin looks like porcelain. I had very fine lines except one above and below my lips. Those are nearly gone now too.  I appreciate the science behind this brand and would not hesitate to try other products. The vanilla scent of this cream is luscious too. I'm not big on fragrance in products, but this is lovely.  I live in a very dry climate, so I usually use 100% Pure's Healing Balm on top. This is a treatment cream, not a highly emollient moisturizer, so I'm ok with that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the light texture of this cream. Even though I have oily skin, this completely absorbs into my skin. I LOVE the faint vanilla cookie type scent and wish all your products smelled like that! I really hate to buy an expensive cream that has no scent!

This is my first Sephora review. Not for lack of buying beauty products (I have spent thousands on them over the years), it's just that I've never been so impressed by a product before. Within 4 weeks of using this cream, I saw a reduction in pore size, a plumping and firming of my skin with frown lines and other wrinkles reduced, and an overall evening of skin tone. This cream is amazing. I am totally hooked, and (noting other comments) who cares what it smells like?!!!

reviews.review_title: Bad candy smell and broke me out (but it works)
reviews.review_text: Cons I actually like fragranced products but this was unbearable cotton candy/bubble gum smell.  Also I'm on my late 40s and dry but occasionally break out from some products and this one broke me out.  Pros It works! I woke up with my skin smoother and lines softer. But I ended up returning it for the above reasons.  If you are ok with the smell and don't break out this May work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved how this felt on my skin, very light, not greasy. Unfortunately, had to was off due to the strong odd vanilla-like scent. Just too strong. Tried just removing from around my nose, but still too strong. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great antiaging cream that really delivers!! My pores have shrunk and are almost gone, laugh lines have diminished and so has the || between my eyes! I'm very happy with this product!!!

I love Algenist, but I am on the fence about this one, and I think, as others say, it's the fragrance. I love the slightly medicinal whiff of the other products, and I love that it disappears right away. I have a sample of Genius, which seems good so far. If I love the results, I'll buy the full size next time around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Genius for almost a week now and have noticed a considerable change in how my skin feels...before it was dry and somewhat flaky...now it's as smooth as can be....like some of the reviews, the fragrance is just not pleasant....to me it smells like vanilla, and I absolutely HATE vanilla...unless it's a milkshake or cookie....anything, no way....iI would have given it a 5 star also, but the fragrance is not pleasant.
I just started using my deluxe sample of this and holy cow is it amazing! My skin is soft and supple. I love using it as a night cream! Ps you are never too young to start using anti aging cream
It's always been a problem for my combination skin to find a lightweight but still complete cream, I really think that this one can work things out to convince my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing. My skin has begun to glow since I started using it! It is smooth, clear and my wrinkles are way better. I am astounded at the results. A little really goes a long way and I can't believe how fantastic my skin looks. I have tried so many creams and I am so happy to have finally found the one! I love the smell to boot ( slightly vanilla). I'm sure the price seems pricey to some but the jar is huge. This is now my holy grail!

I really wanted to love this but the fragrance really bothers me. It's not unpleasant exactly, a bit birthday cake smelling perhaps and not needed. I have other products from this brand and they've all seemed rather neutral smelling.

I've been using the Genius Cream for a month, and so far I am very happy with the results. It is very moisturizing and doesn't irritate my sensitive, dry skin. I have noticed a much improved overall texture to my skin. Very soft, and an added perk of actually plumping skin so fine lines are much less visible. This is one of the first products I've purchased based solely on reviews and it has proved its worth. A little of this whipped cream textured product goes a long way. My face is brighter and firmer and pores on my nose smaller. The only thing I would change is the somewhat baby powder/chemical smell that has been mentioned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried almost the complete line of Algenist products that Sephora offers and absolutely love the line but I am very disappointed with the genius cream. I just don't find it moisturizes as well as the other Algenist creams and it doesn't last throughout the day. I can't wait to finish it and buy the regenerative or firming cream, both of which I love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what I did before Genius...I used to used Algenist lifting moisturizer and I really liked it and had good results but when Genius came out I decided to give it a shot. Oh man, it's awesome. It's even BETTER than regular Algenist moisturizer. It goes on like a very light, whipped cream. A little goes a long way and my skin is smoother and more hydrated. The kicker is that the Algenist moisturizer I used to use was great at fighting wrinkles and moisturizing but Genius kicks it up a notch. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing! And I've tried every high end product at Sephora. I have rosacea, acne scars, capillaries, large pores, flakiness... Just after a week of use my skin looked calm, plump, most of redness is gone, pores shrunk and skin texture improved significantly. Had to run and get it the day I finished my sample. I can even go outside without make now. If you like Algenist you will love this cream.

Having dry/sensitive skin I am always trying new moisturizers.. Trying to find that perfect fit for my skin. I am so thrilled I tried this! I love it so much I can not wait to wash my face so I can use it.. It is a fluffy/whipped texture (it doesn't take much to cover face

This is the first time I've ever spent so much money on a moisturizer, but my 38 year old skin felt it was time. I have terrible dry and irritated skin this time of year, and this product has taken care of the redness and flaking I've been used to. My skin is glowing, and is extremely soft. I'm breakout prone, but have had no breakouts since using. I received a compliment on how great my skin looked from a co-worker. I happen to love the vanilla cookie like smell.

This cream is like having the algenist overnight, firming &lifting and lotion all in one, but with a nice whipped-cream type texture and a scent that is to me, sweet and earthy.A little goes a long way! My skin is combination--no breakout issues with this product. Love this, so happy I chose it as my one full-sized algenist indulgence.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore Algenist skin care. But I have one disappointment with this one. For some inconcievable reason, they decided to add a fragrance to this cream. Totally unnecessary and who needs the alcohol from fragrance, anyway. But worse, it's a sickly sweet scent - costing Algenist a 5 from me.
Very very thick but light and whipped texture. It's anti aging at it's finest

reviews.review_title: A little heavy on the fragarance...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm writing this simply to comment on the fragrance for people who are sensitive. It probably works well and does feel nice going on. However, the fragrance which smells nice in the jar, intensifies after wearing for a little while. It is a chemical baby powder type smell. Some people might be okay with this but be careful if you are sensitive to fragrance. The rep at Sephora was kind enough to give me a sample to try and I'm glad I did since I almost ordered this online. I have used several Algenist products and have not encountered this issue before.

I have been using this every night for 3 weeks and I must say I really am impressed,I wake up with plump glowing skin and absolutely no breakouts also noticed improvement in fine lines and really do like the smell this one is a winner and def worth the $..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this because I've been looking for a really awesome anti-aging cream. It smells delicious and did seem to have a positive effect on some parts of my face. Unfortunately it was a bit too much for other spots on my combination skin -- although most of my skin looked good and felt soft, I also developed a monstrous blemish and a few small ones. I think this should only be recommended for people with dry skin who know they can tolerate slathering things like shea butter and oil on their skin without breaking out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had been using the regular firming Algenist moisturizing and loved that but Genius blows it away!! It is so fluffy and whipped going on that you need very little. I noticed my face being more luminous in a few days. A stranger on a plane asked me how I had such luminous skin. She didn't believe that it was from a moisturizer. I can't recommend it enough! So worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Using Genius along with the cleanser and a few other Algenist products. My skin is so soft and smooth and I have seen changes in my fine lines. Smell is not great but not unbearable. I only use at night...too much under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations for this cream because I had been looking for a new anti-aging product for my night time routine. The texture is really nice because it's not oily and thick like most other jar type creams. I don't notice any big differences in my fine lines, but I've only been using it for a few weeks so maybe it's too soon to tell. It does however seem to do a good job of locking in moisture because I wake up with soft, supple skin in the morning as opposed to a grease slick. I took off a star because the fragrance bothers me, almost like a chemically frosting smell. Also, the cream leaves a slight film on your face so it's not good to use it during the day. I made that mistake and ended up with little white flaky residue on my face and in my hair. Otherwise I think it's great.
